loans.name: Ana Mercedes

texts.es:
ANA DE 46 AÑOS DE EDAD, ACTUALMENTE SE ENCUENTRA ACOMPAÑADA, YA QUE SU ESPOSO SE FUE A ESTADOS UNIDOS Y SE OLVIDO DE ELLOS, ELLA SE ENCONTRO CON UN BUEN HOMBRE QUE LA HA SABIDO VALORAR.  ÉL TRABAJA EN LA AGRICULTURA, ELLA SOLO ESTUDIO HASTA TERCER GRADO, YA QUE POR LA POBRESA QUE VIVIO EN SU FAMILIA NO PUDO SUPERESE EN LOS ESTUDIOS, ELLA TIENE 3 HIJOS, DE LOS CUALES  YA ESTAN ACOMPAÑADOS.

 ELLA POSEE UNA TIENDA EN SU CASA, DESDE SU NIÑES SE HA DEDICADO A TRABAJAR  ANTES LO HACIA EN LA AGRICULTURA, PUES SUS PADRES ERAN AGRICULTORES; PERO CUANDO ELLOS FALLECIERON, SE QUEDO CON SU ABUELA , COMO LA TIENDA ESTA EN SU CASA NO TIENE HORARIO, PUES TIENE QUE ATENDER A LA HORA QUE LLEGAN LOS CLIENTES. 

EL PRESTAMO QUE ESTA SOLIICTANDO A FUNDACIÓN CAMPO, ES PARA  COMPRAR MAS MERCADERIAS PARA SU TIENDA Y ADEMAS PARA EL PROXIMO AÑO ATENDERA UN CAFETÍN DE UNA ESCUELA CERCA DE SU CASA.  ELLA TIENE CLARO QUE SE INCREMENTARA SU TRABAJO, PERO ASI SUS GANANCIAS ECONOMICAS.   
                                                           
EN EL FUTURO ELLA SE VE CON UN NEGOCIO MAS FUERTES, QUE LE PUEDAN DAR ESTABILIDAD ECONOMICA Y PODER AYUDARLE A SUS HIJOS, TAMBIEN AGRADECE LA CONFIANZA POR EL CREDITO OTORGADO, ELLA TIENE CLARO QUE EL PRESTAMO LE SERVIRA DE IMPULSO PARA LOGRAR SUS METAS.
texts.en:
Ana, 46, lives with a partner, as her husband went to the United States and abandoned her.  She found a good man who appreciates her.  He works as a farmer.  Ana has only a 3rd grade education, because due to her family's poverty she was not able to continue with her studies.  She has 3 children who are all in relationships.

Ana has a store in her house.  She has worked ever since childhood.  Previously she worked in agriculture because her parents were farmers, but when they died she was raised by her grandmother.  Ana's store is in her house.  She has no set work schedule, but she tends to her customers as they arrive.

Ana is requesting a loan from Fundacion Campo to buy more merchandise for her store, and also so that she can work tending a school cafe that is close to her home.  She knows that this will increase her workload, but it will also increase her earnings.

In the future, Ana wants to see her business fortified.  This would give her financial stability and enable her to help her children.  Also, she appreciates the confidence being placed in her with respect to this loan.  She knows that this loan will propel her towards accomplishing her goals.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Lenin Martin

texts.es: Don Lennin es originario de la ciudad de Boaco, de 45 años de edad. Casado y padre de un hijo. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de productos variados (CD, DVD, ropa, zapato de hules, controles etc.). Negocio que inicio hace varios años, dando a crédito sus productos. Hasta lograr una línea de venta de todo tipo de productos a crédito. Hoy cuenta con un negocio rentable y próspero. Su meta próxima es comprar una camioneta para vender sus productos en todas las zonas de la ciudad y en otras ciudades. Solicita el crédito para comprar: CD, DVD, Play Station 2, memorias, zapatos de hules, mangas para el sol, entre otros, con el fin de incrementar su inventario para la venta. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes y así crecerá sus ventas. Su plan futuro es seguir comprando más mercadería para trabajar y para vender más.
texts.en: Lennin is from the city of Boaco.  He is 45 years old, married, and has one son.  He is a businessman by trade, engaged in the sale of various products (CD’s, DVD’s, clothing, tennis shoes, controls, etc.)  He started his business several years ago, selling his products on credit until he developed a line of all types of products for sale on credit.  Today, his business is profitable and prosperous.  His next goal is to purchase a van in order to sell his products in all areas of the city as well as in other cities.  He is requesting the loan to purchase CD’s, DVD’s, Play Station 2, memory cards, tennis shoes, “mangas para el sol” [sleeves worn over the arms to protect the skin from the sun], and other products with the purpose of increasing his sales inventory.  He feels that the loan will be very helpful because it will enable him to fill customer orders and, in this way, increase his sales.  His future plan is to continue buying more goods, work harder, and sell more merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase CD’s, DVD’s, Play Station 2, memory cards, tennis shoes, “mangas para el sol”, and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy used clothing and fishing equipment

loans.name: Fatim

texts.fr:
La dame Fatim évolue dans le commerce depuis plusieurs années ; en ce temps là, elle gérait une boutique où elle vendait des denrées alimentaires et cela marchait à merveille jusqu’au jour où elle a été dévalisée. Alors n’ayant plus de fond de roulement, elle a changé d’activité en vendant maintenant des tissus, parfum, encens depuis seulement 2 ans. Elle fait l’activité chez elle et les gens le connaissent pour cela et se déplacent eux même. Madame Fatim est mariée et n’a pas d’enfants, cela ne l’empêche pas de se mêler des dépenses de la maison. La preuve, c’est grâce aux bénéfices générés par l’activité qu’elle a pu soigner son mari qui était malade.
Puisqu’elle est à l’aise dans la vente de boutique, elle aimerait beaucoup avoir un fond pour pouvoir redémarrer cette activité.
texts.en: Ms. Fatim has been working in commerce for several years, during which she used to run a shop selling grocery items. It went beautifully until she was robbed. So, no longer having any working capital, she switched to selling cloth, perfumes, and incense for the last two years now. She operates at home, and people make the trip to her knowing this. Even though Ms. Fatim is married and has no children, she involves herself in covering family expenses. As proof, she was able to take care of her ill husband, thanks to the profits generated by her business. Since she is comfortable as a shopkeeper, she would like very much to have the funds for getting her business going again.

loans.use: to purchase cloth, perfume, and incense to sell

loans.name: Annet

texts.en:
Annet is 34 years old and a resident of a suburb of Kampala. She is married with 3 children, for whom she pays school fees, and has 4 additional dependants who lost their parents and have only her to look after them.
 Annet deals in Agriculture, which she started in 2011 with the aim of harvesting from her gardens to avert famine and to generate income. In addition to that she is also a property agent.
Annet wants a loan of UGX.3,000,000 to purchase manure to boost her seasonal harvest and to also pay school fees for her children.
Annet mainly sells to neighbors and people from other areas. However, she faces a challenge of inadequate capital and sometimes climate conditions that effect her harvest..
Annet has the capacity if she gets enough capital because she is hard working.

loans.use: To buy organic manure

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.en:
Gulnara is 51 years old. She is married and has two children. They live in Baku region. Her son is studying in his fourth course of college and her daughter goes to school. She plays the piano well. 

Gulnara is a cook who makes national dishes such as xingal, dusbere, qutab, etc. Then she sells this food to a store. 

Now Gulnara needs a loan in the amount of 2100 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to buy a new stove, plates and dishes. Therefore she applied to Komak company for the loan. Gulnara is thankful to the Kiva organization and lenders for their help. In the future she wants to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy a new stove, plates and dishes

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN MARTIN DE ZURITE”; Este banco está ubicado en el Poblado de Zurite,  provincia de Anta y  departamento de Cusco.

La Sra. Marcelina, sigue dedicándose a la agricultura y ganaderia,la socia cria sus animalitos para luego continuar vendiendolos en las ferias y a sus clientes que le solictan,la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicandose a este negocio el cual le trae satisfaciones tanto economicas como personales, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de alimentos y fertilizantes para su chacra.

La socia agradece el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas de forma disciplinada
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the “San Martin de Zurite" communal bank. This group is located in the village of Zurite, Anta province, in Cusco department.

Marcelina is continuing to farm and raise livestock. She raises young animals to later sell them at the markets and to customers that ask her. She has been working in this business for some time, which brings her both financial as well as personal satisfaction. 

The borrower wishes to be able to continue working in this way so that she can continue to support her family. The borrower is requesting the loan in order to buy animal feed and fertilizers for her small farm. She is grateful for the loan provided and promises to make her installment payments on time.

loans.use: To buy animal feed and fertilizers for her small farm.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes es una joven de 21 años, la cual trabaja como secretaria en una institución de su ciudad, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para salir adelante y sobre todo seguir estudiando la carrera técnica de computación e informática.

Mercedes esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá comprar materiales de construcción para poder mejorar su habitación ya que colocara un piso de cemento y tarrajeara las paredes, así podrá mejorar su calidad de vida, sobre todo por su pequeño hijo  de 5 años al cual quiere mucho.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a young woman of 21 who works as a secretary at a institution in her city. With this, she is able to have the income to keep going, and especially to continue studying for a technical diploma in computing and informatics.

Mercedes is grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to their support she will be able to buy construction materials so that she can improve her home. She will install a cement floor and plaster the walls. In this way she will be able to improve her quality of life; above all for her small five-year-old son, whom she loves very much.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Manuela De Jesus

texts.es: Manuela de Jesús es originaria de la ciudad de León, soltera y madre de 2 hijos. Tiene 38 años de edad. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva en general. Inicio el negocio hace 2 años con capital propio y poco a poco ha logrado salir adelante. Su meta próxima es aumentar sus clientes y ofrecerles una mayor variedad de productos. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Camisas, Pantalones, Vestidos, Faldas y Zapatos. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá ofrecer más productos a sus clientes y en las mejores condiciones físicas del negocio, así obtener ganancias para ayudar a sus hijos en los gastos escolares. Su plan futuro es establecer una gran tienda y ofrecer una amplia variedad de productos.
texts.en:
Manuela de Jesús comes from the city of León.  She is the mother of two children and is single; she is 38 years old.  

She is a retailer who works selling new clothing in general.  She began her business two years ago with her own money and, little by little, has managed to get ahead.  

Her next goal is to increase her customer base and offer them a greater variety of products.  She is asking for this loan to buy shirts, pants, dresses, skirts, and shoes.  She thinks that this loan will be of great help to her because she will be able to offer more items in the best physical condition to her customers.  In this way she can get better earnings to help her children with their school expenses.  

Her future plan is to establish a great store and offer a wide variety of products.

loans.use: to buy shirts, pants, dresses, skirts, and shoes.

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicandose a la agricultura, la socia lleva años dedicandose a esta actividad el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia  a su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia cultiva maiz,papas entre otros,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia solcita el credito para comprar fertilizantes y abono para su chacra.

La socia esta feliz con el credito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues working in agriculture; she has been doing this work for years, which is going well for her due to the effort that she puts into her business every day. She is a responsible and determined person; it is in this way that she gets her family ahead.

She cultivates corn and potatoes, among others. She wishes to be able to keep working, because it is in this way that she supports her family.

This member is requesting the loan in order to purchase fertilizer and compost for her small farm. She is glad for the loan and is committed to making her quota payments.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and compost for her farm.

loans.name: Johanna Maricela

texts.es:
La Señora Johanna está realizando su cuarto crédito a lado de sus amigas y compañeras del grupo de crédito Mujeres Floreciendo, vive por la comunidad de Paccha en Cuenca, lugar que goza de un clima frió, de exuberante vegetación y de verdes campos, tiene una arquitectura que es mezcla de lo antiguo y lo moderno, su gente es amable gentil, siendo su principal actividad la agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio.
Ella tiene 23 años de edad, está casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 7 y 6 años que están estudiando en una escuelita del sector, su esposo labora en un taller de latonería, la casa en la que vive es propia.
La Señora. Johanna se dedica al cuidado de sus hijos y los quehaceres, de su hogar, también se dedica a la cría de pollos y credos los que los vende cuando tiene alguna necesidad económica.
El dinero de su crédito es para comprar pollos y  alimento para animales. Su meta es tener un criadero más grande de animales.
texts.en:
Señora Johanna is asking for her fourth loan, together with her friends and groupmates from the Mujeres Floreciendo credit group.  She lives near the Paccha community in Cuenca, a location that enjoys a cold climate, wild vegetation, and green countryside.  It has an architectural style that is a mix of ancient and modern.  Its people are kind and courteous, and their chief fields of work are agriculture, animal husbandry, and trade.

Johanna is 23 years old.  She is married, and with her husband has two children, ages 6 and 7 years.  Her children study in a local elementary school.  Her husband works in a  brass workshop.  The house she lives in is her own.

Señora Johanna works caring for her children and doing the household chores.  She also raises chickens and pigs, which she sells when she has a financial need.

The money from her loan is to buy chickens and animal feed.  Her goal is to have a larger nursery for the animals.

loans.use: to buy chickens and animal feed

loans.name: Sigyongyaakadi Group

texts.fr:
Mme SAFIETOU est la représentante du groupe SIGYONGYAAKADI. Elle se porte bien. Elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants. Le plus âgé a 16ans et le moins âgé a 07mois. Les 03 vont a l’école. 
Elle vend des pagnes  et aussi des produits de beauté depuis 06ans. Mme s’approvisionne au marché du secteur 10.Ses clients sont les femmes et hommes.
Elle veut s’acheter 05 pièces de pagnes.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut épargner. Elle ambitionne  étendre les limites de son activité et mieux s’occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Safietou is the representative of the Sigyongyaakadi group. She is doing well. She is married and the mother of four. Her eldest child is 16 years old, and the youngest is seven month old. Three of her children attend school.

She has been selling traditional “pagnes” fabrics and beauty products for six years. She stocks up at the Section 10 market. Her customers are both men and women. She would like to buy five pieces of “pagnes” fabric.
With her earnings, she would like to grow her savings. Her goal is to expand her business and better provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy five sets of traditional fabric.

loans.name: Hli

texts.en:
Hli was born and raised in Kunsaatan Village, about one hour north of Huay Hom Village (where she lives now).  She grew up in a traditional Hmong hill tribe family and spent her childhood working in difficult field labor instead of going to school.  She has always been frustrated by her lack of education. 

Hli married a man from the San-wang clan and lived for many years as a traditional Hmong wife, working in the fields and caring for her family.  She had ambitions beyond her limited domestic role and always dreamed of being able to provide more than the bare necessities to her children.  When she learned about the opportunity to weave hammocks, she was excited about the chance to learn a new skill and earn her own income.

Now Hli has been weaving for several years and her family is very proud of her achievements.  With this loan, she will transition into a role as a main breadwinner for her family.  She will also be able to manage their household finances better through the financial training program.  She is very grateful to the Kiva community for helping her achieve her dream of financial empowerment.

loans.use: to get her own hammock production going and become an independent producer.

loans.name: Si, Si, Si Group

texts.es: El  grupo “Si, Si, Si” está conformada por socios que se dedican al comercio minorista y también a la agricultura. Rosa tiene 33 años es conviviente con 02 hijos educando. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas al por menor  palta chirimoya y a la vez compra tunas directamente de las chacras para luego expenderlos por mayor en los mercados. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de más paltas chirimoyas. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Rosa se encuentra parada viste polo blanco.
texts.en:
The group "Si, Si, Si" (Yes, Yes, Yes) is made up of members who work in retail businesses and also in agriculture.  Rosa is 33 years old, is married and has two school-age children. She sells chirimoya fruit (also called custard apple - a sweet fruit native to the Andes and similar in external appearance to an avocado)  at retail.  She also buys tuna directly from the fish farms to then sell at wholesale in the markets. She will use the loan to buy more chirimoyas.

The group is grateful to Kiva investors for the loan they are offering. Rosa is the one standing, dressed in a white T-shirt.

loans.use: to buy more chirimoya (aka custard apple - a sweet fruit native to the Andes, similar in appearance to an avocado).

loans.name: Emely

texts.es: Emely  una joven de 22 años egresada en la carrera de Enfermera Técnica. Con los deseos de seguir superándose decide estudiar su segunda profesión de Farmacia y Bioquímica. Agradece a sus padres por el apoyo y la confianza brindada. Emely busca mejorar cada día, pues ella sabe que de esta manera puede conseguir mejores oportunidades laborales. Su mayor deseo es de terminar satisfactoriamente su carrera y poner una farmacia. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para el pago de su primer ciclo. Emely agradece a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito
texts.en:
Emely is a young woman, age 22.  She is a graduate of a Nursing Technician program.  With her desire to keep improving herself, she has decided to study for a second degree in Pharmacy and Biochemistry.  She is thankful to her parents for the support and trust they have given her.  

Emely looks to improve every day, because she knows that in this way she can get better job opportunities.  Her biggest desire is to finish her degree satisfactorily and open a drugstore.  The loan she has asked for is designated to pay for her first semester.  Emely is thankful to the people who made this loan possible.

loans.use: to make a payment for her first semester.

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicandose al negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes,la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicandose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia a la vez continua dedicandose al negocio de kiosko escolar,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.


La socia solicita el credito para comprar cuyes para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cupoast establecidas
texts.en:
This member continues working in the business of raising small animals like guinea pigs. She has been in this business for some time, which is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her business every day.

Currently, she continues to work at her schoolside stand. She is a responsible and determined person; it is in this way that she gets her family ahead.

This member is requesting the loan in order to purchase guinea pigs for her business. She feels grateful for the offered loan, and she is committed to paying off her scheduled quotas.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fungicide, fertilizer, pesticide, and insecticide.

loans.name: Rudy Lisandro

texts.es:
Rudy, es soltero, vive solo, para costear sus gastos instalo una tienda en su casa de habitación, ya tiene 6 años de poseer su negocio, lo atiende solo, su horario es de 5:00 a.m. a las 8:00 p.m., para emprender su negocio lo apoyo un amigo, su mayor ventaja es que en su localidad no tiene más competencia.
Invertirá en la compra de pastas, azúcar, bebidas, granos básicos, detergentes y jabón, etc., espera fortalecer su negocio lo suficiente para cumplir con las demandas de los clientes, dar una mejor atención, mejorar sus ventas y tener una economía más sólida.
Sueña con expandir el negocio en otro local para mejorar su economía y seguir mejorando su estilo de vida.
texts.en: Rudy is single and lives alone. In order to finance his expenses, he opened a store in his home. He has been running his business for six years and tends to the store alone. His schedule is 5:00am to 8:00pm. A friend helped him launch his business. His greatest advantage is that there is no competition in his neighborhood. He will invest by purchasing pasta, sugar, drinks, grains, detergents, soaps, etc. He hopes to adequately stock his business to satisfy the demand of his customers, have good customer service, increase his sales and have stronger finances. He dreams of expanding his business to another area to increase his income and continuing improving his way of life.

loans.use: to buy pasta, sugar, drinks, grains, detergents and soap

loans.name: Luís Alonso

texts.es:
LUIS  DE 51 AÑOS DE EDAD, NO TIENE NINGUN GRADO DE ESTUDIO SOLO APRENDIO A FIRMAR, POR SER EL MAYOR DE 7 HERMENOS  TENIA QUE AYUDAR A SUS PADRES A TRABAJAR, SU ESPOSA Y SUS 3 HIJOS MAYORES LE  AYUDAN A TRAJAJAR  EN LA AGRICULTURA, LOS 5 HIJOS VIVEN CON ÉL Y ELLOS ESTAN ESTUDIANDO.


ÉL TODA LA VIDA SE HA DEDICADO A TRABAJAR EN LA AGRICULTURA, LO ARENDIO DESDE NIÑO PUES ERAN DE ESCASOS RECURSOS ECONOMICOS Y TENIAN QUE SALIR ADELANTE, ACTUALMENTE APARTE DE DEDICARSE A TRABAJAR EN LA AGRICULTURA, CUIDA UNA HORTALIZA DE PLATANOS DE DONDE RECIBE UN DINERO EXTRA,  DESDE LAS 6 AM HASTA LAS 5PM QUE REGRESA, PORQUE TIENE QUE VIAJAR EN BICICLETA CERCA DE 1 HORA.  


EL DINERO DEL PRESTAMO LO UTILIZARA PARA COMPRAR, SEMILLA, ABONO Y FERTILIZANTES DE MEJOR CALIDAD DE LA QUE AHORA TIENE.   TIENE LA VISION DE QUE CON LA AYUDA DE SU FAMILIA, PUEDE TRABAJAR UN POCO MAS DE LO ACTUAL.     
                                                           

LOS SUEÑOS DE  LUIS SON VER A SUS HIJOS REALIZADOS Y QUE ELLOS PUEDAN TENER LO QUE ÉL NO TUVO. CON EL PRESTAMO ESTA SEGURO DE QUE PODRA SALIR ADELANTE Y LAS GAANCIAS LAS UTILIZARA PARA PAGAR DEUDAS Y DARLE ESTUDIOS A SUS HIJOS, SABE QUE ES UN COMPROMISO MAYOR PERO TAMBIEN ASI VERA MEJORES RESULTADOS.
texts.en:
Luis is 51 years old and did not attend school. He only learned to sign his name. This is because he was the eldest of seven siblings and had to help his parents with the work. His wife and their three older children help him to farm. Five children live with him and they are going to school. He has farmed all his life, a livelihood that he learned at a young age, as their family was low-income and had to make a living.

Currently, apart from farming, he looks after a plantain crop from which he earns extra money from 6:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. when he comes back. This is because he has to travel around an hour by bicycle. He will use the money from the loan to buy seed, manure, and better quality fertilizers than what he has now. He has the vision that with his family's help he can work a bit more than at present.

Luis' dream is to see his children succeed and be able to have what he didn't have. With the loan, he is confident that he will be able to move forward in life. He will use the earnings to pay debts and provide for his children's education. He knows that it is a greater commitment, but that this way he will also see better results.

loans.use: To buy seed, manure, and better quality fertilizers that what he has now.

loans.name: José Julio

texts.es:
JOSÉ DE 50 AÑOS DE EDAD,  ESTA SEPARADO DE SU MUJER,  TIENE 3 HIJOS DE LOS CUALES 1 YA SE LE CASO Y 2 ESTAN VIVIENDO CON ÉL. ÉL FUE MARINERO POR MUCHO TIEMPO, TAMBIEN CABE MENCIONAR QUE ESTUBO EN LOS ESTADO UNIDOS 7 AÑOS; PERO SE VINO PORQUE LO NECESITABAN SUS HIJOS, YA QUE ESPOSA NO LOS CUIDABA BIEN. 

 ACTUALMENTE SE DEDICA A PESCAR,  ÉL POSEE UNA LANCHA EN EL CUAL SE EMBARCA,  ESTO LO APRENDIO DE SU PADRE; YA QUE EN EL LUGAR DONDE VIVEN LA MAYORIA DE PERSONAS VIVEN DE ESO, LO AYUDAN EN LA PESCA 2 AMIGOS DE LA INFANCIA,  ELLOS NO TIENEN HORARIOS PUES SE EMBARCAN Y SALEN HASTA LOS 2 O 3 DIAS HASTA QUE HAN LOGRADO PESCAR  ALGO, AL FINAL CUANDO REGRESAN SE REPARTEN ENTRE LOS 3 LAS GANANCIAS EN OCACIONES QUE LES VA BIEN Y DIAS QUE NO SACAN NI LOS GASTOS, PERO EN FIN ESA ES SU FORMA DE GANARSE LA VIDA.   

EL DINERO DEL PRESTAMO LO UTILIZARA,  PARA COMPRAR MAS Y MEJORES REDES Y ANSUELOS 
 HAY MOMENTOS QUE NO PESCAN LO SUFICIENTE O LAS REDES SE LES ROMPEN PORQUE YA SON DEMASIADAS VIEJAS.                                                                

SU SUEÑO ES, SACAR ADELANTE A SUS HIJOS Y VERLOS REALIZADOS QUE ELLOS TENGAN UNA VIDA DIFERENTE A LA QUE EL TUVO, ÉL TIENE FE QUE POR MEDIO DEL CREDITO, PUEDA TENER MEJORES GANACIAS  Y ASI OBTENER UNA MEJOR CALIDAD DE VIDA.
texts.en:
José is 50 years old and separated from his wife. He has three children, of which one is already married and two are living with him. He was a sailor for a long time. It is also worth mentioning that he was in the United States 7 years, but he came because his children needed him since his wife was not taking good care of them.

At present, he works in fishing. He has a boat he takes out. He learned this from his father since the region where they live, most people make a living this way. Two childhood friends help him with the fishing. They do not have a schedule, they take off and leave for up to two or three days until they have managed to catch something. When they return they divide the profits between the three of them. On some occasions it goes well for them and other times they do not even recover expenses but this is the way he makes a living.

He will use the money from the loan to purchase more and better nets and fishing bait. There are times when they do not fish enough or the nets break on them because they are too old.

His dream is to get ahead for his children, to see them fulfilled and to see that they have a different life than the one he had. He has faith that by means of the loan he'll be able to earn better profits and achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more and better fishing bait and nets.

loans.name: Ramon

texts.es:
Ramón, necesita un nuevo crédito para aprovechar esta temporada de fiestas navideñas, comprara hierro por mayor para seguir trabajando en la elaboración de anillos para cumas y cumpliendo con los encargas de sus clientes.
Con la inversión anterior Ramón le permitió fortalecer su negocio, tener mejores ingresos con los que ha cancelado sus compromisos económicos y sigue saliendo a delante junto a su familia.
texts.en: Ramón needs a new loan to take advantage of the Christmas season. He will buy wholesale metal to continue his work producing rings for 'cumas' [type of machete] and fulfilling his customers' orders. With his previous loan, Ramón was able to strengthen his business, make more revenue to settle his financial obligations, and continue moving forward with his family.

loans.use: to buy wholesale metal

loans.name: Gloria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Doña Gloria es una señora 54 años, originaria del municipio de El Sauce, tierra de leche y miel que se caracteriza por tener personas muy trabajadoras como es el caso de doña Gloria que desde muy joven labora como conserje en el Hospital de dicho municipio para sacar adelante a sus hijos los que hoy son personas de bien.
Doña Gloria es una señora humilde muy querida en el municipio que con el sudor de su frente hoy tiene su propia casa donde tiene mejores condiciones de vida.
Se presentó a la oficina de Ceprodel en busca de un financiamiento de los inversionistas de Kiva para la compra de medicina y realización de ultrasonidos con el fin de realizarse un estudio médico y así mejorar su salud.
Espera y confía en Dios que estas personas de buen corazón apoyen su solicitud porque con su salario apenas alcanza para sobrevivir.
texts.en:
Gloria, 54, is from the town of El Sauce, a land of milk and honey known for having very hard-working people. This is the case for Gloria who from a very young age has worked as a caretaker for the hospital of El Sauce in order to support her children. Today her children are good people.

Gloria is a humble women that is well loved in the community. With her hard work she today has her own house where she has better living conditions.

She came to the office of CEPRODEL in search of a loan from Kiva investors in order to buy medicine and an ultrasound to complete a medical exam and improve her health. 

Gloria hopes to and trusts in God that these good-hearted people will help her request because with her salary she barely makes enough to survive.

loans.use: to buy medicine and complete an ultrasound.

loans.name: María Aurora

texts.es:
La Sra. María forma parte del grupo de crédito Mujeres Floreciendo hace algunos años, tiempo en el que ha establecido muy buena amistada con todas sus compañeras. Vive en la ciudad de Cuenca ciudad que tiene una belleza natural, como arquitectónica, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, esta bañada por 4 ríos y es una ciudad cuna de poetas y deportistas.
La Señora. María tiene 68 años y es madre soltera de 2 hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad, están casados y viven independientes, la casa en la que vive es el fruto de su trabajo y sacrificio.
Doña María se dedica hace algún tiempo se dedica a la venta de platos típicos como son quimbosos, tamales, chumales y dulces, esta actividad la aprendió por habilidad y  ahora este negocio le da la oportunidad de ser una mujer independiente, se gana su propio dinero y no depende de un sueldo, también este trabajo le permite ayudar a la solvencia económica de su hogar. 
Su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de víveres para la elaboración de sus platos, esta repitiendo el crédito ya que necesita más víveres para continuar ampliando su negocio.
texts.en:
Maria has been part of the loan group Mujeres Floreciendo (Flourishing Women) for some years, and in that time she has established very good friendships with her group members. She lives in the city of Cuenca, a city that has natural beauty like architecture and since December 1999 it has been a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It’s surrounded by 4 rivers and is a birthplace of poets and athletes. 

Maria is 68 years old and is a single mother to 2 adult children who are married and live independently. The house where she lives is fruit of her labour and sacrifice. Maria, for some time now, has been selling traditional dishes such as quimbosos (a corn-based steamed dessert), tamales, chumales (a type of tamale) and sweets. She learned this skill and now this business gives her the opportunity to be an independent woman who earns her own money and doesn’t depend on a salary as well this work allows her to help with household finances. 

Her previous loan she invested in the purchase of supplies, to make her dishes. She is requesting this loan because she needs more supplies to continue to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Serge Noel

texts.fr: Serge est un jeune célibataire de 33 ans qui exerce son commerce de detail des accessoires de téléphone mobile dépuis 04 ans dans un marché de la place. son activité marche très bien . il veut un pret pour booster son stock de marchandises ainsi que les ventes et par conséquent engendrer les bénéfices suplementaires  qui sera re investi dans son activité toute en privillegiant le rembousement du crédit. ses ambitions sont celles de la vente des accessoires de téléphone et le dépannage VIP  pour assurer les meilleurs conditions de vie familliales.
texts.en:
Serge is a young bachelor of 33 years who has been in the business of mobile phone accessories retail for 4 years in an open-air market. His business is very successful. 

Serge is requesting a loan to increase is stock of merchandise and therefore his sales, in order to generate additional profits which he will reinvest in his business. This will allow him to repay his loan. His goals are to sell phone accessories and VIP repairs to ensure better conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone accessories and parts for sale and repair.

loans.name: Cruzloma  (Paute) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Cruzloma está conformado por 12 socias y 1 socio quienes viven por el sector del Descanso en Paute, goza de un clima templado, de tierras fértiles donde se pueden cosechar una gran variedad de frutas, su principal fuente de ingresos es la crianza de animales, la agricultura y el comercio, muchos salen a diario a la ciudad a ejercer diferentes actividades económicas. Las socias son mujeres muy amables y gentiles que trabajan a diario para mejorar su estabilidad económica, luchan día a día por su superación y para ofrecerles a sus hijos un mejor futuro, aun mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. María, tiene 63 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos mayoría de edad y casados, su hija casada le acompaña al igual que sus tres nietos, la casa en la que vive es propia.
Doña María desde hace varios años se dedica a la venta de granos secos en un mercado de la ciudad, esta actividad le permitió sacar adelante a sus hijos. En su casa se dedica a la cría cerdos y pollos. 
Su nuevo crédito es para comprar granos secos y así aumentar su negocio. Su meta es  continuar creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
The Cruzloma Credit Group consists of twelve women and one man from the Descanso section of Paute Canton in Ecuador. This region has a temperate climate and fertile land that allows farmers to grow a tremendous variety of fruits. Most people in the Descanso area earn most of their income from farming, raising animals, and running shops. Many Descanso residents go to the city each day to pursue various jobs. 

The Cruzloma members are all friendly and kindhearted people who work each day in order to achieve greater economic stability. They strive to improve their lot and to offer their children a brighter future, while also preserving their culture and traditions.  

One of the Cruzloma members is Doña María, a 63-year-old single mother of two adult children who are married. Doña María owns her own home, where she lives with her married daughter and three grandchildren.   

Doña María has for several years worked selling staple foods in a city market, which has allowed her to provide for her children. She also raises pigs and chickens at her home. 

Doña María is applying for a new loan to purchase staple foods and boost her inventory. Her ambition is to continue growing her business.

loans.use: to purchase staple foods.

loans.name: Sagrado Corazon De Jesus Group

texts.es:
La Asociación comunal Sagrado Corazón de Jesús, está conformado por diez integrantes, madres solteras con quince hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarias de la Leon. Lugar que está ubicado en la zona  de occidente del país. Se caracterizan por ser trabajadoras, responsables, con ganas de superación personal. Lamentablemente no pudo cursar una carrera y se vio obligada a  trabajar desde temprana edad. En sus ratos libre le gusta disfruta de la compañía de la sus hijos. En la actualidad lucha para brindarle un futuro mejor  a sus hijos.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la coordinadora es Eufemia y tiene por actividad económica la venta de pan simple y dulce de forma ambulante y por encargo. Todos los días ella carga una canasta de unos 20 kg ofreciendo su producto. Actividad que la desempeña con mucho gusto. Su rutina de trabaja es de unas  10 horas diarias ofreciendo pan como cachos, tortas de pasa, rin, semitas, pan simple, maletas, bolillos, tortas de pasas,
texts.en:
The “Sagrado Corazon de Jesus” is made up of ten members, single mothers with 15 children to care for.  They are from Leon, located in the western zone of the country.  They are known for being hardworking, responsible, with a desire for personal success.

Unfortunately she was not able to study for a career and she was obligated to go to work from a young age.  She likes to spend time with her children in her spare time.  She works hard to provide a better future for her children.

Thanks to her efforts and desire to get ahead, Eufemia sells simple and sweet bread on foot and to order.  Every day she carries a 20 kg basket of product and she does this with great joy.  She works 10 hours a day selling bread in chubs, raisin bread, rings, “semitas,” “maletas,” rolls, and raisin cakes.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Tali

texts.en: Tali is 53 years old and married with seven children. She owns and operates a small flea market. She has been doing this for three years. Tali needs a loan to buy shoes, clothes, lava-lava (traditional Samoan garment), and hair gel, hair clips and bangles.She hopes to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. She became a member of SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy shoes, clothes, lava-lava, and hair gel, hair clips and bangles

loans.name: Kathleen

texts.en: Kathleen is 22 years old and has no children. She would like to start a small business selling lava-lava (traditional Samoan garment) in her community. In order to do this,Kathleen needs a loan to buy a painting board, paint brush, fabric, needles, thread and a new sewing machine. She hopes to use her profits to save for family needs. She has been a member of SPBD since 2013.

loans.use: to buy a painting board, paint brush, fabric, needles, thread and a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Mulu

texts.en: Mulu is 43 years old and married with seven children. She makes and sells elei (painted fabric) printed material to earn a living and has been doing this for three years. Mulu has requested a loan to buy material, paint, brushes, stencils, and designs. She plans to use her profits to pay for her children's education. She joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy material, paint, brushes, stencils, and designs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building material

loans.name: Mercedes Del Socorro

texts.es: Mercedes, casada, madre de un hijo en edad escolar, habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, su esposo labora como comerciante por cuenta propia, la actividad comercial de la señora Mercedes es la venta de Abarrotes, es dueña de una pulperia, el credito lo solita para la compra de Arroz, Frijoles, Carnes, Refrescos, Aceite, etc. con la ganacias que mercedes obtiene de su negocio a hio realizando mejoras en su vivienda ya que para ella lo primordial es darle a su hijos las condiciiones necesarias para su futuro.
texts.en: Mercedes is married and is the mother of a son who is school-age. She lives in the municipality of Ticuantepe. Her husband is self-employed as a vendor. Mercedes is also a business woman who runs her own small grocery store. The loan she is requesting is to buy rice, beans, meats, soft drinks, oil, etc. With the income she earns from this business, Mercedes will use to do some improvements on her home because, for her, the most important thing is to provide her children with the necessary conditions for a good future.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wholesale spices

loans.name: Isabel Del Carmen

texts.es:
ISABEL 51 AÑOS DE EDAD, ESTUDIO HASTA TERCER GRADO, PORQUE SUS PADRES PENSABAN QUE EL ESTUDIO NO SIRVIA Y SOLO APRENDER UN OFICIO LE IBA A AYUDAR EN SU VIDA, ACTUALAMENTE SU ESPOSO TRABAJO EN LA AGRICULTURA Y DE VIGILANTE PRIVADO, TODOS SUS  5 HIJOS ESTAN ACOMPAÑADOS.

 ISABEL ACTUALMENTE  TIENE UN PUESTO DE VENTAS DE TORTILLAS,  DEDES HACE 15 AÑOS Y LO ARENDIO POR LA NECESIDAD QUE ESTABA PASANDO DEBIDO A UNA MALA DECISIÓN DE PARTE DE SUS PADRES, ADEMAS POR LAS TARDES VENDE PAN EN LOS ALRREDEDORES DE SU CANTON, DONDE TIENE QUE CAMINAR CERCA DE UNOS 5 KILOMETROS.  ELLA DESDE LAS 6:00 AM QUE EMPIAZA A  TRABAJAR HASTA LAS 6:00 PM QUE REGRESA A SU CASA A DESCANSAR.

EL DINERO DEL PRESTAMO LO UTILIZARA, PARA INVERTIR EN LA VENTA DEL PAN Y PIENSA EN PONER A 2 PERSONAS MAS QUE LE AYUDEN, TAMBIEN EN MEJORAR LA CHANPA DONDE VENDE LAS TORTILLAS.

TODO HARA QUE ELLA TRABAJE MAS, PERO ESTA SEGURA DE OBTENER MEJORES INGRESOS ECONOMICOS.                                                       

LOS SUEÑOS DE  ISABEL SON VER A SUS HIJOS ECONOMICAMENTE MEJOR  Y AYUDARLES A QUE ELLOS PUEDAN TENER MEJORES OPORTUNIDADES DE LAS QUE AHORA TIENEN Y ESTA SEGURA DE QUE LA OPORTUNIADAD DE TENER UN RECOR CREDITICIO EXCELENTE,  LE IRA ABRIENDO MUCHAS PUERTAS.
texts.en:
Isabel is 51 years old. She was in school until the third grade, because her parents thought that education was not useful and that only learning a trade would help her in life. Currently, her husband works in agriculture and as a private guard. All of her 5 children are married.

At this time, Isabel has had a stall for selling tortillas for 15 years. She learned to do this out of necessity, owing to the bad decision on her parents' part. In addition, she sells bread in the afternoon in the areas around her canton, where she has to walk around 5 kilometers. She starts working at 6:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m., when she returns home to rest.

She will use the money from the loan to invest in selling bread. She is thinking of hiring 2 more people to help her, and also of making improvements on the stall where she sells her tortillas. All this will make more work for her, but she is sure of getting more income.

Isabel's dreams are to see her children better off financially and to help them to be able to have better opportunities than they have now. She is sure that this opportunity of having an excellent credit record will open many doors for her.

loans.use: to purchase bread; she is thinking of hiring 2 more people to help her and also of improving the stall where she sells her tortillas.

loans.name: Graciela Del Carmen

texts.es:
Graciela del Carmen habita en la comarca de Río Grande del municipio de El Sauce, como su nombre lo dice a la orilla de este poblado pasa un enorme rio caudaloso que es el atractivo de sus visitantes.
Doña Graciela es una profesora de 50 años con 28 años de servicio educando a niños y jóvenes que son el futuro de Nicaragua.
Es una profesora muy querida en su comunidad porque tiene la cualidad de ayudar al más necesitado en lo que puede y paciencia para enseñar a leer y escribir a los niños.
Es madre soltera de tres hijos dos de ellos a su cargo que están en edad escolar y que le ha tocado una vida difícil sin el apoyo del padre por lo que con su bajo salario ha tenido que cubrir alimentación, estudios y salud para sacarlos adelante; sin embargo esto no ha sido un obstáculo para lograr su objetivo de prepararlos profesionalmente porque ya van encaminados hacia un mejor futuro.
En este momento la profesora Graciela necesita un crédito para compra de útiles escolares y pago de colegiatura de sus hijos, ya que se acerca la entrada a clases, por lo que necesita el apoyo de los inversionistas de Kiva para que a través de Ceprodel le financien este crédito que será de gran ayuda para su familia.
texts.en: Graciela del Carmen lives in Rio Grande county in the El Sauce municipality.  As the name indicates, at the edge of this town there is a mighty river which attracts visitors.  Doña Graciela is a 50 year-old professor with 28 years of service educating children and young people who are the future of Nicaragua. She is a very well loved teacher in her community because she helps those who need it the most in any way she can, and because she is patient teaching children to read and write.  She is a single mother with three children, two of whom are school-aged and live with her.  They have had a hard life without the support of their father, and she has used her low salary to pay for food, education, and healthcare to raise them.  Nevertheless this has not been an obstacle to her goal of preparing them for a profession, and they are on track to a better future.  Professor Graciela needs a loan to purchase school supplies and to pay school fees for her children now that the school year is about to begin.  She needs the support of Kiva lenders to finance this loan through Ceprodel.  It will be a great help to her family.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies and pay school fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy books, notebooks, and other supplies.

loans.name: Kasaija

texts.en:
Kasaija is a resident of Bbutoa, a suburb of Kampala.  He is married with four children, for whom he pays school fees. 

Kasaija deals in the business of collecting empty plastics. He started the business in 2008. In addition to that, he has a transport business that earns him additional income.  

Kasaija wants a loan of UGX 3,000,000 to purchase more stock of the recyclable materials for his business, especially the big plastics, so as to earn more income and put up more developments. He thinks collecting plastics helps to clean the town and also protects the environment.

His major customers include all householders, for water collection, and various companies. However, he faces a challenge of inadequate capital, competition, and some changes in demand for goods.

Kasaija has the potential and capacity for working if he gets enough capital because is such a hardworking man.

loans.use: to buy recyclable materials.

loans.name: El Señor Es Mi Rey Group

texts.es:
La asociación comunal  el señor es mi rey está conformado por trece integrantes diez mujeres tres hombres, madres y padres responsables con ganas superación personal. Son originarios de  la zona norte del país. Se caracterizan por ser trabajadores, responsables, con ganas de superación personal. En sus ratos libre le gusta le gusta disfruta de la compañía de sus hijos.  Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económico no pudo cursar una carrera y se vieron en la necesidad de trabajar desde temprana edad.  En la actualidad luchan día a día para brindarle un futuro mejor.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la coordinadora es candelaria  y tiene por actividad una pulpería, es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles en cantidades pequeñas como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, detergente, frijoles, maíz, fósforos, aceite, jugos, gaseosas, verduras, huevos. Ella dedica a su negocio unas 12 horas diarias, el negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. La asociación comunal EL señor es mi Rey agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
El Señor es mi Rey (The Lord is my King) communal bank is made up of thirteen members, ten women and three men, all responsible parents who want to have personal success. They are from the north of the country. They are characterized by their hard work, responsibility and desire for personal success. In their spare time they like to spend time in their children's company. Sadly, a lack of financial resources means they couldn't pursue a career and were forced to start working from an early age. Currently they fight every day to provide a better future for them.

Thanks to her efforts and desire to get ahead, the coordinator of the group who is from Candelaria owns a grocery store - a small stall from which she sells edible products in small quantities like rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, detergent, maize, matches, olive oil, juices, sodas, greens and eggs. She works 12 hours a day and her business is located at her home. The objective of this loan is to be working capital for her business buying and selling edible products so that in the not too distant future she can improve her income.

The El Señor es mi Rey communal bank thanks Kiva lenders for the help they provide to people without means and from poorer countries like Nicaragua so that they can have dignified jobs.

loans.use: have working capital for her business selling edible products like rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, detergent, maize, matches, olive oil, juices, sodas, greens and eggs

loans.name: Alex

texts.en: Alex is a married man. He has 4 children. He describes himself as experienced. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his vehicle. He has been involved in this business for 7 years. His business is located in a viable place with lots of customers, and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of funds to buy spare parts and fuel. He will use the Kes 80,000 loan to buy spare parts and fuel. His business goal is to be successful within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will be successful. This is his third loan with SMEP DTM. Previous loans were repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and fuel.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Sabina; la socia sigue dedicándose a su negocio de tienda de abarrotes y venta de verduras, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azucar,golosinas entre otros,la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicandose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como leche y azucar para su negocio.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The borrower is Sabina, who still works in her grocery store and sells vegetables. She sells different types of products such as rice, sugar, and sweets, among other things. The borrower has been working for a long time in this business and it's doing well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day. The borrower wants to keep working so she can continue to assist her family, because this is how she supports them. She's happy about the loan that she's requesting to purchase merchandise like milk and sugar for her business, and pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise like milk and sugar for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cell phone accessories.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es:
Dora, invertirá en la compra de maíz y leña para hacer las tortillas, para fortalecer su negocio, y de esa forma seguir cumplir con las demandas de sus clientes.
Con el capital anterior Dora incremento su inventario, cuenta con clientes nuevos, sus ventas son mejores y su economía está mucho mejor. Su familia se encuentra muy saludable y la apoyan en el negocio.
texts.en:
Dora will buy corn and firewood to make tortillas, strengthen her business, and continue meeting her customer demand.

Dora used her previous loan to increase her inventory and got new customers.  Her sales are better and her finances have gotten much better.  Her family is very healthy and they support her in her business.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge, opta por otro crédito por que el crédito anterior le facilito su trabajo ya que le dio un mejor trato a su cultivo y obtuvo una mejor producción, sus condiciones económicas han mejorado, y ha cancelado puntual su deuda.
En esta ocasión invertirá en la recolección de su cosecha, ya que cancelara mano de obra y transporte hasta su casa, le facilitara acortar el tiempo en el que cumplía con sus clientes y de esa manera tendrá las ganancias en un menor plazo.
texts.en:
Jorge is choosing to take out another loan because his previous loan made his work easier, as he gave better treatment to his crops and obtained better output. His economic conditions have improved and he has paid off his debt punctually.

This time, he will invest in gathering his harvest, since he will pay for labor and transportation from his house. It will enable him to lessen the time in which he settles with his customers, and in this way, he will have more earnings in a shorter period of time.

loans.use: to pay for labor and transportation.

loans.name: Claudia Marisol

texts.es:
Claudia de 29 años de edad, es una madre de familia, ella vive en unión libre con su compañero de vida, ambos trabajan. Ella se dedica al comercio informal de tamales de elote, su compañero de vida trabaja en la pesca. Por sus pocas oportunidades solamente pudo cursar hasta tercer grado, por esa razón ella se dedica a este negocio en el sector informal, Claudia es madre de dos hijos, el primero de 7 años de edad, él está cursando su educación básica a nivel del primer grado y su hermanito menor con sus tres años de edad, no asiste a la escuela por su corta edad. Esta pareja de esposos demuestran ser muy trabajadores y  manifiestan sentirse muy bendecidos por tener trabajo, consideran que el trabajo es la fuente de ingresos que les permite suplir las necesidades del hogar y a través de este van sacando a su familia adelante, gracias a ese esfuerzo es importante mencionar que la casa donde viven es propia. 

Claudia se inició en el negocio del comercio de tamales de elote, en el sector informal como la última alternativa para apoyar a su esposo, ya que las pesca es rentable por temporadas, trabajando los dos sería más sencillo sacar sus hijos adelante, como toda mujer trabajadora decidió apoyar su hogar aprendiendo un oficio que le permitiera generar ingresos para apalear la difícil situación que se hacía sentir cuando solo trabajaba su esposo, a través de los consejos de familiares y amigos ella fue acercándose a personas que se dedicaban al comercio de tamales y fue así que conoció como funcionaba este negocio, ahora ella cuenta con 3 años de experiencia en este rubro lo cual le ha permitido  ganar una cartera de clientes bastante significativa, la cual le permite mejorar sus ventas y así obtener mejores ganancias, todo esto en conjunto le permite generar los ingresos para apoyar a su compañero de vida y mantener a su familia. Ella posee un puesto en el mercado, el cual atiende de lunes a domingo en un horario de 3:00 pm a 5:00 pm, ella prepara su venta por las mañanas y luego ella se traslada de su hogar hasta su negocio en transporte público a una distancia de unos 6 kilómetros de su vivienda.

Ella está solicitando un crédito para mejorar su negocio, es decir ampliar su mercadería y ofrecer más variedad de productos a sus clientes, ella considera que con el 100% del monto del crédito puede lograr ese objetivo. Ella manifiesta que ofreciendo más variedad, ella puede mejorar sus ventas y mantener y ampliar su cartera de clientes, además convertiría su negocio en un negocio más competitivo ya que sus productos han tenido tanta aceptación que ahora trabaja también por encargos y sus ventas mejoran en días festivos. Ella esta muy motivada por poder contar con el dinero para poderlo invertir en su negocio.


A través de su experiencia en el comercio de tamales, Claudia considera que obteniendo el crédito ella puede hacer crecer su negocio diversificando sus productos  y contar con mejores ingresos para su familia. Uno de sus más grandes sueños, es sacar adelante sus hijos y convertirlos en profesionales. Además, apoyar siempre a su compañero de vida, ya que de esta manera las condiciones de vida de su familia sera mejor, con el apoyo de CREDICAMPO ella espera hacer sus sueños realidad y ser como siempre lo ha sido una mujer con ganas de trabajar y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Claudia is 29 years old.  She is a mother and lives with her common law husband. Both work.  She sells corn tamales and her partner works in fishing. Due to limited opportunities, she was only able to attend school until the 3rd grade.  For this reason she has a business in the informal sector.  Claudia has two sons.  The first is 7 years old.  He attends elementary school and is in the first grade.  His younger brother is 3 years old and does not attend school yet due to his young age. This couple is very hard working and say they feel very blessed to have work.  Work is the source of income that allows them to pay for the things they need for their home and to improve the lives of their family.  Thanks to their efforts, they own the home where they live. 

Claudia started her business selling corn tamales in the informal sector as a last resort to support her husband, because fishing is seasonal work. With them both working it is easier to provide for their children.  Like all working women, she decided to support her household with a job that would allow her to make money to improve the difficult situation they experienced when her husband was the only one working.  After getting advice from friends and family, she approached people who had businesses selling tamales and learned from them how the business works.  She now has 3 years of experience and a large group of customers, which helps her improve sales and earn more.  All of this allows her to make money to support her partner and her family.  She has a stand in the market, where she works from Monday to Sunday from 3pm to 5pm.  She prepares the tamales in the morning and then takes public transportation from her home 6 kilometers to her business.

Claudia is requesting a loan to improve her business.  She wants to expand her product selection and offer more variety to her customers.  She believes that with 100% of the loan amount she will be able to achieve this goal.  She states that by offering more variety she can increase her sales, keep and expand her customer base, and convert her business into one that is more competitive.  Her products have been so well received that she now takes special orders and her sales increase during holidays.  She is very motivated by being able to invest money in her business. 

Through her experience in the tamale business, Claudia believes that getting a loan will enable her to grow her business by diversifying her products.  She will also have more income for her family. One of her greatest dreams is to help her children succeed and for them to become professionals.  She also wants to support her life partner so that the family's living conditions will be better.  With the support of CREDICAMPO she hopes to make her dreams a reality.  She will continue to be what she always has been, a women with the desire to work and succeed.

loans.use: to increase her stock and offer a greater variety of products to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a graduate degree.

loans.name: Olga Patricia

texts.es:
Ella es una persona responsable, cumplida, honesta, respetuosa, con alto sentido de compromiso.
Vive con la mama, tiene 3 hermanos hombres y una hermana, son muy unidos y religiosos.
Siempre le ha gustado todo lo que trate de la salud, aprendió a hacer varias cosas relacionadas con el área de la salud oral que a ella le han parecido muy interesante y siente que aprendiendo cada días mas le puede ir mejor laboralmente.
Lo más importante de la carrera es tener mejores oportunidades, aprender cosas nuevas y salir adelante para poder en el futuro darle lo mejor a los hijos y a la familia.
En la vida se le han presentado obstáculo, pero con la ayuda de Dios y las personas los ha podido superar, de los cuales aprendió a valorar la vida y a ella misma.
Sabe que de la mano de Dios pueda terminar la carrera y ser profesional para ayudar o crear campañas para las familias de bajos recursos, ya que siempre ha sido uno de los  sueños de ella. 
También ha pensado en fundar una clínica odontológica para ayudar a  prevenir enfermedades bucales en niños y  jóvenes.
Ella es feliz ya que se le presento la oportunidad de estudiar y superarse a ella misma sin derrumbarse gracias a la ayuda que en este momento puede tener con kiva y  de las personas que la quieren y la apoyan en la carera que decidió estudiar.
texts.en:
She is a responsible, thoughtful, honest, and respectful person with a high sense of commitment.  She lives with her mother.  She has three brothers and a sister.  They are very close and are religious.

She has always liked everything having to do with health.  She learned to do various things related to the area of oral health, which seems to her to be very interesting.  She feels that learning more everyday can help her to get along in her career.  

The most important thing in her major is to have better opportunities, to learn new things and to get ahead so as to be able to give her children and family the best in the future.

She has met with obstacles in her life, but with the help of God and people, she has been able to overcome them.  From them, she learned to value life and herself.  

She knows with God’s hand she can finish her degree and be a professional.  As a professional she can help, or can create campaigns for low-income families, because this has always been one of her dreams.  She has also thought of founding a dental clinic to help prevent oral disease in children and youth.

She is happy because this opportunity to study and improve herself without toppling herself presented itself to her.  This is thanks to the help that she can have with Kiva and from the people who love her and support her in the major she has chosen.

loans.use: to pay for one semester's registration.

loans.name: Fred

texts.en:
Fred is 36 years old, a resident of the outskirts of a city. He is married with 7 children who all attend school. He deals in a business of plumbing materials which was started in 2009 with an aim of boosting his daily income. In addition to that, he is a driver who drives a truck [FUSO] that fetches him additional income. 

Fred has applied for a loan of 3,000,000 UGX to purchase more stock of plumbing materials for his business. However he faces the challenges of inadequate capital, rental expenses and some competitors. He hopes some of these challenges will be overcome after getting the funding from Kiva lenders through UGAFODE Micro-finance. 

His customers are fellow plumbers and people from various areas that have same profession, including builders. Fred has the capacity of working if he gets enough capital to expand his business.

loans.use: To buy pipes to sell.

loans.name: Alegria Group

texts.es: Doris, tiene 40 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos, vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Hace aproximadamente 20 años que se dedica a la compra de mercadería en general como producto de enchape, desodorantes, cremas, ropa, sandalias y otros que le encarguen. El negocio lo tiene en su casa y cuenta con buena clientela. El préstamo es en forma grupal pero en lo personal solicita 17,000 Lempiras, siendo el sexto ciclo con la institución y lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos como cremas, desodorantes, maquillajes y lociones para  surtir su negocio y poder aumentar sus ganancias. Su meta es tener un mejor nivel de vida con su familia. El grupo se llama Alegría y lo forman dos personas, que viven en la misma comunidad, se dedican al comercio y han solicitado un préstamo grupal de 26,000 Lempiras para surtir de cosméticos y lociones para vender.  En la foto esta Doris a la izquierda de blusa rosado y Sonia a la derecha.
texts.en:
Doris is 40 years old, a single mother of two children and lives in the Choloma municipality in Cortes. For approximately the last 20 years she has bought and sold general products such as veneer, deodorants, creams, clothes, sandals and others. Her business is run from her home and she has a good clientele.

This loan is in group form but personally she is asking for 17,000 lempiras and this is the sixth loan with the institution. She will use it to buy cosmetics such as creams, deodorants, make up and lotions for her business to increase her revenue. Her aim is to provide a better quality of life for her family.

The group is called Alegría (happiness) and is made up of two people who live in the same community. They are both traders and have requested a group loan of 26,000 Lempiras to buy cosmetics and lotions to sell. Doris is pictured on the left in the pink blouse and Sonia is on the right.

loans.use: buy cosmetics such as creams, deodorants, make up and lotions to sell

loans.name: Mariano Antonio

texts.es:
Mariano de 64 años de edad, estudio hasta primer ciclo de básica, por la situación económica que pasaba su familia no logro seguir estudiando. Él es casado su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos en su hogar, actualmente en su vivienda viven sus 5 personas su esposa y 3 hijos que actualmente se encuentran estudiando y que en los momentos libres le ayudan en los trabajos agrícolas y que son las únicas personas que dependen de él.  

Mariano se dedica a la agricultura en la siembra de granos básicos (maíz, frijol), desde que él estaba pequeño sus padres le inculcaron a aprender este trabajo como era la única alternativa de trabajo y de ingresos en aquellos  tiempos, por eso se dedicaba a la agricultura. Aparte de dedicarse a la agricultura también se dedica a la ganadería en la compra y venta de  ganado, que es otra actividad que le genera ingresos económicos para su familia. Para llegar a su lugar de trabajo, tiene que caminar 30 minutos a pie que también recibe el apoyo de sus hijos y esposa para realizar los trabajos agrícolas.

   El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar insumos agrícolas  y recolección de granos básicos (maíz, frijol), el préstamo le ayudara a poder recolectar los frutos más adecuadamente y eficientemente en el tiempo específico, sin mayores complicaciones de perdida.

Mariano  desea para el futuro tener una mejor calidad de vida para él y su familia  y obtener  mayor  producción de granos básicos y vivir cómodamente en un lugar digno para sus hijos y que sus hijos sigan estudiando para que en el futuro sean  personas profesionales y logren terminar su estudios y sacar  una carrera universitaria todo esto lo lograra con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación con su  esposa y mucho trabajo y por supuesto con futuros prestamos que sacara.
texts.en:
Mariano is 64 years old.  He completed the first years of elementary school, but due to his family's financial situation he was not able to continue his education.  He is married and his wife is a homemaker.  There are 5 people living in their home, including his wife and 3 children.  The children are currently in school.  In their free time they help with the agricultural work, and are Mariano's only dependents.   

Mariano is a farmer who plants basic grains (corn and beans).  His parents taught him how to do this work when he was very young.  It was the only opportunity for work and income in those days, and he became a farmer.  In addition to his work in agriculture he also works in ranching, buying and selling cattle, which is another activity that provides income for his family.  He walks 30 minutes to work.  He receives help with the agricultural work from his wife and children. 

The loan he is requesting is to purchase agricultural supplies and to harvest basic grains (corn and beans).  This loan will help him harvest his crops better and more efficiently in season, without the large complications of lost crops.

Mariano wants a better quality of life for himself and his family and to increase the production of his crops.  He would like to live comfortably in a dignified place for his children, and for his children to continue their education in order to become professionals.  He hopes they successfully complete their education and obtain a college degree.  All of this he will achieve with a lot of hard work and dedication, with his wife, a lot of work, and of course future loans.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural products and to harvest basic grains (corn and beans).

loans.name: Teresa Del Rosario

texts.es: La señora teresa, habita en  una zona en donde los habitantes son muy humildes de escasos recursos, así como también tiene un alto índice delincuencial, ella tiene la edad de 34 años, es madre de familia de 3  hijos siendo el mayor de 16 años, todos estudiantes de  una escuela pública, ella se dedica al comercio de bisutería en su casa de habitación y también por encargo, cuenta con el apoyo económico de su esposo. Esta es su primer experiencia crediticia que solicita para comprar materiales de construcción para instalar servicios higiénicos y empezar la construcción del muro frontal en su vivienda, esta última es muy importante y urgente, en vista de que cuando llueve el agua pasa llevándose la tierra y dejando hoyos, lo cual es peligroso ya que puede afectar el nivel de la casa en un futuro, por eso la necesidad de levantar dicha obra que vendrá a dar seguridad e higiene en su hogar para la familia.
texts.en:
Teresa lives in an area where most people are very poor and have limited resources. The area also has a high crime rate. Teresa is 34 years old and the mother of 3 children, the oldest of whom is 16 years old. They attend public school and Teresa sells jewelry from her home and by order. Teresa does have the economic support of her husband. 

This will be her first experience with taking out a loan. She is requesting a loan to purchase construction items to install plumbing and to begin constructing a wall in front of her home. The construction of the wall is particularly important and urgent because when it rains the water carries away the earth, leaving dangerous holes which can impact the foundation of the house. Because of this, Teresa needs to pursue construction projects  which will provide security and hygiene to their family home.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, iron, blocks and tiles.

loans.name: Simaolo

texts.en:
Simaolo is 43 years old and single, with two children. 

She has a small vegetable garden to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. 

Simaolo has requested a loan to buy vegetable seeds, gloves, a wheelbarrow, fertilizer, and sprayers. 

She just became a member of SPBD this year. With her profits, Simaolo hopes to help pay her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, gloves, a wheelbarrow, fertilizer, and sprayers

loans.name: Rosa Elizabeth

texts.es: Rosa, tiene 43 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene dos hijos, vive en el municipio de Puerto, Cortes. Su tipo de negocio es la venta de mercadería en general, este negocio lo tiene desde hace un año y lo tiene ubicado en un local del mercado donde alquila, también vende de forma ambulante, vende ropa, sandalias y ropa interior. Esta solicitando un préstamo por 7,000 Lempiras, el cual lo invertirá, en la compra de más producto como ropa, sandalias y ropa interior con el propósito de vender y aumentar sus ingresos. Su meta es agrandar más el negocio y  así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rosa is 43 years old, is in a common law marriage and has two children.  She lives in the town of Puerto, Cortes.  She sells general merchandise and has done so for a year.  Her business is located in a rented shop in the local market.  She also sells on foot and sells clothing, sandals and undergarments.  She is asking for this loan of 7,000 Lempiras to buy more merchandise, like clothing, sandals and undergarments to sell and increase her income.  Her goal is to grow her business and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Ololailumtia

texts.en:
Teresa has 5 children and also runs two businesses: a shop that sells clothing and jewelry and a hair salon.  Without power, Teresa must rely on either costly kerosene for lighting her home and shops or small solar lanterns.  Neither of these provide power that Teresa can use for activities that will improve her and her childrens’ lives or her business activities.  With the loan, Teresa can connect to the micro-grid installed in Ololailumtia.  The solar powered micro-grid will deliver 240V AC electricity to Teresa's home and shops.  

Teresa’s home of Ololailumtia is a rural village, almost 100km and at least a three hour drive from the national grid power.  The village sits on the edge of the Maasai Mara and serves as a commercial hub for both the Maasai residents and safari camp workers inside the reserve.   With power in her shop, Teresa can use a refrigerator to sell cold drinks and other items.  These are a rare commodity in her village and the profit she generates can be re-invested into her business.  She also can offer more hair services in her salon because she has electricity to use electric hair clippers and for TV and radio to attract customers.  Teresa estimates that on a given market day, she can sell over 100 sodas and give enough haircuts to cover her entire monthly electricity spending.  

Teresa will also be able to provide more for her family with a source of electricity.  Teresa will be able to have more lighting for her home and shops, and at a much cheaper price than kerosene, giving her extra income to spend on her children’s school fees or re-investing in her businesses.  She will also be able to power a laptop computer for her family to use.   Teresa is ecstatic about the possibility of having a connection to the micro-grid in her home and shops – the access to reliable and affordable power will transform how she runs her businesses and provides for her family.  

Aside from Teresa, 10 other members of the village are also a part of the loan connecting to the grid:  Sammy, Dorcas, Elizabeth, Mary, Habon, Rashid, Amos, John, Mbugua, and Pauline.   They are also a combination of home and small business owners and are looking forward to the positive impact that micro-grid power will have on their homes and businesses.

loans.use: To pay for a connection to the solar micro-grid installed in Ololailumtia.  With connection to power, Teresa will be able to increase her business in her shop and salon, by selling cold drinks, phone charging, and offering haircuts using electric clippers.

loans.name: Señor De La Esperanza De Huaripache Group

texts.es: Jovita tiene 41 años es conviviente con 03 hijos dependientes. Ella se dedica a la ganadería y a la vez a la venta de queso y leche. Es de esta manera que puede apoyar a su esposo con la alimentación y educación de sus hijos. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de más queso y leche. El grupo “SEÑOR DE LA ESPERANZA DE HUARIPACHE” agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Jovita es la primera del lado izquierdo. Y de la misma manera se encuentra incluida la foto de Yajaira en la parte superior izquierda que no pudo estar presente en la reunión por motivos laborales.
texts.en:
Jovita, 41, has a live-in partner and 3 dependent children. She raises cattle and sells cheese and milk. This is how she can support her husband with food and education for their children. 

She will invest the loan in the purchase of more cheese and milk. The group “Señor de la Esperanza de Huaripache” is grateful to Kiva lenders for the loan offered. 

Jovita is the first on the left and Yajaira’s photo is inserted at the top left as she couldn’t be present at the meeting due to work.

loans.use: to purchase more cheese and milk.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana, de 61 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. Ana, se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles y bebidas en su tienda la cual está instalada en su hogar, siendo muy concurrida por los vecinos y transeuntes que pasan por la zona, a todos atiende con amabilidad. le gusta su trabajo porque le permite apoyar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar con el unico fin de sacar a su familia adelante, tiene muchas ganas de seguir creciendo en su rubro y surtir  su negocio con más productos. En esta oportunidad solicitara S/.1500 soles y se siente muy agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará productos comestibles en general tales como  arroz, azúcar, harina y bebidas al por mayor.
texts.en:
Ana, 61, is married and has 3 children who live with her in her own house. Ana sells food and drinks in her store, which is set up in her house. She is very busy with her customers, neighbours and passers-by, who she attends to in a friendly manner. She likes her work because it allows her to help her husband with household expenses with the aim of getting their family ahead. She has a strong desire to continue growing in the same line of business and to stock her business with more products. 

At this time, she is requesting 1,500 Peruvian Nuevo Soles and she is very grateful for the financial support that she is receiving to continue ahead. As well, she promises to pay the monthly instalments on time. With the amount requested she will buy food products such as rice, sugar, flour and drinks wholesale.

loans.use: to buy food products such as rice, sugar, flour and drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products such as rice, sugar, milk, noodles, candy, soft drinks, and other items.

loans.name: Orlando Jose

texts.es: Orlando tiene 28 años de edad, originario de la ciudad de León, Soltero y estudiante de una universidad de la ciudad de León.
