A pesar de su nivel económico ha salido adelante con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación asi como ha cumplido sus metas propuestas. Sus deseos de prosperar lo motivaron a trabajar y estudiar al mismo tiempo para pagar sus estudios, y se siente orgulloso de lo que ha logrado hasta el momento. Su familia lo apoya en gran manera. Solicita el crédito para suplir todos los gastos de su graduación. Su plan futuro es conseguir un trabajo en el que pueda obtener mejores ingresos y así contribuir con su familia y su comunidad.
texts.en: Orlando is 28 years old.  He is from the city of León.  He is single and a university student in León.  Despite his financial circumstances he has succeeded with hard work and dedication to achieve his goals.  His desire to prosper motivated him to work and go to school at the same time to pay for his education, and he is proud that he has been successful so far.  His family is very supportive.  He is requesting a loan to help with educational expenses.  His future plan is to get a job and earn more money so he can contribute to his family and his community.

loans.use: to help pay for educational expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood to repair her store.

loans.name: Karla Maria

texts.es:
Karla, se decidió por otro crédito ya que le ayudan a comprar juguetes, CDS,  artesanías y otros, de manera rápida, además invertirá en la reparación de su carpa, para seguir trabajando y continuar generando ingresos para solventar sus gastos familiares.
Con el préstamo anterior pudo surtir su inventario, lo que le ha permitido tener un negocio más grande, mejoro sus ventas y su economía mejoro.
texts.en:
Karla is asking for another loan to buy toys, CDs, arts and crafts, and other things quickly.  She will also repair a tent so she can continue working and generating income to pay her family expenses.

She used the money from the previous loan to stock her business, which allowed her to have a larger, better business and increase her sales and finances.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Sailagi

texts.en:
Sailagi is 48 years old and single with three children. For the past two years she has owned and operated a small flea market.

Sailagi became a member of SPBD to gain access to capital for her business. She is now applying for a 1,500 WST loan to buy clothes, shoes, hair products and body lotion to sell. She hopes to use her profits to pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, hair products and body lotion to sell.

loans.name: Siloi

texts.en:
Siloi is 24 years old and has a child. For the past three years she has owned and operated a small store, selling items such as lava-lava, shirts, makeup, souvenirs, etc.

Siloi became a member of SPBD in 2008 to gain access to capital for her business. She is now applying for a 2,000 WST loan to buy snacks, soft drinks, sugar, salt, onions and flour to sell. She plans to use her profits to support her child.

loans.use: to buy snacks, soft drinks, sugar, salt, onions and flour to sell.

loans.name: Ismenia Delfina

texts.es:
Ismenia, se decidió por otro crédito debido a la necesidad de invertir en el negocio de venta d atol en esta ocasión comprara una mesa plegable para colocar los recipientes de atol y dar una mejor imagen ate sus clientes, el resto lo invertirá en compra de materia prima para hacer atol.
Con el préstamo anterior logro atraer más clientes, aumento sus ventas, tiene una mejor economía lo que le da la posibilidad de cumplir con sus compromisos económicos, también les está enseñando el oficio a sus hijas.
texts.en:
Ismenia decided to request another loan because she needs to invest in her business. She sells “atol” [a drink made with a cornflour base], and will purchase a folding table which she will use to arrange her atol glasses and make her business look nice for customers. She will invest the rest of the loan in the ingredients used to make atol.

With the last loan Ismenia attracted more customers, increased sales, and earned more money which enabled her to fulfill her financial obligations. She is also teaching the business to her daughters.

loans.use: to purchase a folding table.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, disfruta la dicha de tener un hogar muy unido, es casada, vive con su esposo y tres de sus hijos, ella en su familia aprendió a comercializar frutas y verduras, ya tiene 22 años realizando esta actividad, tiene un horario de 7:00 a.m. a 10:00 a.m., es de esta forma que genera ingresos para apoyar con los gastos familiares.
Con el capital compra repollo, jilotes, tomates, papayas, chiles, naranjas., etc., con lo que podrá ofrecer mercadería fresca y de calidad a sus clientes, espera aumentar sus ventas, tener más clientes y mejorar su economía.
Sueña con dar a sus hijos una superación académica superior y ampliar su vivienda.
texts.en: María is married, lives with her husband and three of her children, and enjoys the good fortune of having a very tight-knit family. In her family she learned how to market fruits and vegetables and has been doing so for 22 years. Her work schedule is 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM and this is how she generates income to help pay family expenses. With the capital she will purchase cabbage, ears of corn, tomatoes, papayas, peppers, oranges etc, so that she can offer fresh, quality merchandise to her customers. She hopes to increase her sales, have more customers, and improve her finances. Her dream is to provide her children with a better education and expand her home.

loans.use: To purchase cabbage, ears of corn, tomatoes, papayas, peppers, oranges, etc.

loans.name: Jose Guillermo

texts.es:
José, solocita un crédito que le servirá para comprar barniz, clavos, pegamento, bisagras, etc., entre otros accesorios para desempeñar bien su trabajo, espera cumplir con sus encargos y continuar dando lo necesario a su familia

Con el créditoque se le dio con anterioridad fortalecio el negocio y le ha dado buenos resultados sus ingresos son mayores y tiene  más clientela.
texts.en:
José is requesting a loan that will allow him to buy varnish, nails, glue, hinges, etc, among other accessories to perform his work well. He hopes to complete his orders and continue giving the necessities to his family.

With the loan that he received before he strengthened his business and it has given him good results-- his income is higher and he has more customers.

loans.use: To buy varnish, nails, glue, hinges, etc.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
Dolores, solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar aderezos, azúcar, bebidas, golosinas, detergente, etc., lo que le ayudara seguir teniendo a sus clientes satisfechos y dando mejor variedad de productos.
El préstamo anterior le permitió surtir su negocio, atraer nuevos clientes y mejorar su economía, su familia tiene el mismo núcleo familiar y están viviendo en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Dolores requests a new loan to purchase items such as seasoning, sugar, beverages, candies, and detergent. The loan will help him continue to satisfy his customers and offer a greater variety of products.

He used his last loan to stock his business, attract new customers and earn more money. His family is still composed of the same nuclear family members and they are all living in better conditions.

loans.use: to purchase seasoning, sugar, beverages, sweets, detergent and other items.

loans.name: Sonia Elsy

texts.es:
Sonia, tiene una mayor demanda de sus servicios por lo que solicita un nuevo crédito para invertir en la compra de carnes, verduras, arroz, azúcar, bebidas, etc., para continuar preparando la comida, además podrá comprar mesas para atender mejor a los clientes.
El crédito anterior le dio la posibilidad de incrementar su clientela, mejorar su economía y dar una mejor imagen al negocio, cancelo sus deudas y su familia tiene mejores condiciones de ve vida.
texts.en: The demand for Sonia's services has increased which has led her to seek a loan that she will use to purchase meats, vegetables, rice, sugar, beverages, etc. to continue preparing food.  She will also be able to purchase tables that will allow her to better serve her customers.  The previous loan allowed her to expand her customer base, improve her finances and improve the business's appearance.  She has paid off her debts and her family now has better living conditions.

loans.use: purchase meat, vegetables, rice, sugar, beverages, etc...

loans.name: Gladis Marina

texts.es:
Gracias a su primer financiamiento doña Gladis compro los insumos y abonos necesarios para poder asistir sus cultivos protegiendo a estos de plagas, enfermedades entre otros que pudieron de no tratarse a tiempo ser afectados. Ella pudo abonar media manzana cultivada la cual produjo 12 cargas de maíz por lo que tuvo que comprar 6 quintales de abono, tres de herbicidas y el dinero restante para poder limpiar y pagar la mano de obra para poder al mismo tiempo aplicar los insumos comprados. Ella agradece el apoyo brindado por los inversionistas en KIVA y la cooperativa COMIXMUL quienes ella considera están muy interesados en el bienestar y desarrollo de cada uno de los pequeños productores y demás por lo que ella hoy en día nuevamente se acerca a la institución para poder nuevamente solicitar un segundo financiamiento con el cual podrá dar nuevamente asistencia y mantenimiento a una manzana completa de tierra cultivada de maíz.
Sus planes son seguir trabajando con la cooperativa y dichos fondos ya que la tasa de interés es accesible hasta formar un capital propio y fuerte para no depender del financiamiento para hacer crecer sus cultivos esperando nuevamente ella pueda ser apoyada con un nuevo crédito para lograr sus metas, planes y sueños.
texts.en:
Thanks to her first loan, Gladis bought the supplies and fertilizers necessary to tend to her crops, protecting them from infestations and diseases which could have affected them if not treated in a timely manner. She was able to fertilize half of a plot which produced 12 bushels of corn.  She had to buy 6 quintals of fertilizer, 3 of herbicide, and she used the rest of the money for clearing and paying the labor to apply the products she purchased. 

She is grateful for the support of Kiva investors and the COMIXMUL cooperative.  She feels that they are very interested in the welfare and development of every one of the small farmers and it is for that reason that she is again asking the institution for a second loan. With this loan she will be able to tend and maintain a whole plot of land planted with corn. Her plans are to continue working with the cooperative and stated funds because the rate of interest is reasonable and it allows her to build her own strong capital and not rely on financing to grow her crops. She hopes that she can once again be supported with a new loan so she can attain her goals, plans and dreams.

loans.use: to buy new agricultural supplies to tend to a cornfield

loans.name: Johana Catalina

texts.es:
Johana, una mujer de 29 años de edad, es madre de dos hijos y cabeza de hogar. Se dedicaba a ser ama de casa pues convivió con el padre de sus hijos pero luego de 12 años él los abandonó dejándolos sin sustento, pues era quien se encargaba de pagar los gastos del hogar. Con la necesidad de velar por el sustento y el bienestar de sus hijos, obtuvo la ayuda de una vecina que le enseñó a manejar máquinas de confección y corte y; poco a poco fue adquiriendo técnica y conocimientos e inició laborando como pulidora en diferentes talleres; pero luego pasó a manejar las máquinas; gracias a ello, hoy en día presta el servicio de confección a terceros, trabaja todos los días de 7 am a8 pm; la desventaja es que no posee máquinas propias, sino que paga alquiler a una vecina; sin embargo así ha logrado generar los ingresos necesarios durante los últimos 6 años que lleva laborando en el oficio.
Actualmente solicita el crédito para comprar una máquina recubridora y una fileteadora e insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, elásticos, entre otros); esto le permitirá tener sus propias máquinas y hacer su negocio más rentable, pues no tendrá que pagar alquiler para elaborar la producción; además de brindará la opción de adquirir nuevos contratos, mejorando así los ingresos para su familia.
Johana tiene como propósito principal acreditar y fortalecer aún más su negocio y, en un futuro tener la posibilidad de ampliarlo para ampliar sus ventas y generar una estabilidad económica que le permita sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Johana, 29, is the mother of 2 children and is the head of the household.  She used to be a housewife when she lived with the father of her children, but later after 12 years he abandoned them, leaving them without a means of support.  At this time, she had to take over the responsibility of paying for the household expenses.  With the need to oversee the livelihood and welfare of her children, Johana learned to operate a sewing machine with the help of a neighbor.  She gradually acquired skill and knowledge.  She started out working as a polisher in different workshops, but later she started to sew, and thanks to this, she is currently working as a dressmaker for third parties.  She works every day from 7am until 8pm.  One disadvantage is that she doesn't have her own sewing machine; instead she pays to rent one from a neighbor.  However, she has been able to generate the income that she needs this way over the last 6 years that she has been in this line of work.

At this time, Johana needs a loan to buy a coverstitch and overlock (industrial) sewing machine, and also to buy supplies at wholesale (fabric, thread, elastic, etc).  This will allow her to have her own machines, which will make her business more profitable because she won't have to pay rent to make her garments.  In addition, this will provide her with the ability to acquire new contracts, thereby increasing her family's income.

Johana's main goal is for her business to become even more recognized and fortified so that in the future she can possibly expand it to increase her sales and generate financial stability, enabling her to provide for her children.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine and dressmaking supplies at wholesale, including fabric, thread, elastic, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase paint and hire workers.

loans.name: Koleta

texts.en: Koleta is a 45-years-old woman who is married with 2 children. She has a small taxi service business. Koleta needs a loan to buy a spare tyre, fluid oil, engine oil and brakes. She will use her profits to help her family's living standard and to upgrade her business. Koleta joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a spare tyre, fluid oil, engine oil and brakes.

loans.name: Yadira Del Carmen

texts.es: Yadira, es habitante de un barrio en donde sus pobladores son de muy escasos recursos, la señora  es trabajadora viene luchando durante años para apoyar a sus dos hijos en la educación y desarrollo personal, actualmente ella se dedica a su pequeño negocio de venta de comida en su casa y a la vez recibe pedidos por encargos a domicilio, abasteciendo a empresas. Doña Yadira solicita este crédito con el objetivo de comprar materiales de construcción para mejorar las condiciones de su casa, una parte primordial para llevar a cabo bien su negocio, es mejorar las condiciones del área de cocina y empezar la construcción de un cuarto, gracias a este crédito podrá ir avanzando poco a poco reordenando su vivienda, que le permita comodidad en su hogar y trabajo.
texts.en:
Yadira lives in a neighborhood where the residents are very poor.  She is a hard worker who has strived for years to support her two children in their education and personal growth.  Currently, she works in her small business selling food from her home.  She receives orders for homes, and also supplies businesses.  

Yadira is seeking a loan to purchase construction materials to repair her home.  An essential part of carrying out her business is to improve the kitchen area and build an additional room.  With this loan, she will be able to slowly move forward in rearranging her home, which will allow her comfort in her home and business.

loans.use: purchase cement, sand, iron, bricks and gravel

loans.name: Sinuu

texts.en:
Sinuu is a 19-years-old single woman with no children. 

She has a small vegetable garden to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years. Sinuu has requested a loan to buy gloves, fertilizer, chemicals, vegetable seeds, a wheelbarrow and a garden hose. 

She just became a member of SPBD this year. With her profits, Sinuu hopes to help with her families weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy gloves, fertilizer, chemicals, vegetable seeds, a wheelbarrow and a garden hose.

loans.name: Salote

texts.en: Salote is 18 years old and single with no children. She makes and sells elei printed material to earn a living and has been doing this for 2 years. Salote has requested a loan to buy material, paint, brushes, stencils, and designs. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. She joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy material, paint, brushes, stencils, and designs.

loans.name: Yonasan

texts.en:
Yonasan is 36-years-old and married to Paulina, with whom he has six children and four of them attend school in Kibaale.

Yonasan is a farmer who grows sugarcane as his main business but also grows maize and groundnuts in addition to sugarcane.

He has approached Ugafode for a loan of UGX 1,200,000 to pay school fees for his one daughter, Mary, who is joining a nursing school. He expects to repay the loan using income from sugarcane.

His dream is to educate all his children and acquire more land in a nearby trading centre.  His main challenge is the low prices that are always offered for his products.  He describes himself as a hardworking and honest person.

loans.use: To pay his daughter's tuition

loans.name: Crecencia

texts.es: Crecencia: Es originaria de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 49 años de edad, madre soltera de 3 hijos mayores de edad, profesionales. Con el propósito de contar con una fuente de ingreso para la manutención de sus hijos, con apoyo de su hermano instaló hace 21 años su tienda de ropa nueva para adultos y niños. Recuerda que inicio vendiendo ropa interior, accesorios de belleza y cosméticos y con las ganancias percibidas le ha permitido ir creciendo. Solicita financiamiento para comprar mercadería en Managua: Media docena de pantalones para hombres, mujeres y niños, media docena de falda, short y camisetas para hombres, mujeres y niños, sabanas, cortinas, sandalias para niñas y mujeres. Su sueño es que su negocio continúe creciendo, exhibir la ropa en maniquís y continuar apoyando a sus hijos, para que tenga su propia vivienda.
texts.en:
Crecencia is a native of Puerto Cabezas.  She is 49 years old and is a single mother of three children who are all working adults.  With the goal of having a source of income to support her children, she opened a clothing store for adults and children, with the help of her brother.  She remembers that she started by selling underwear, beauty accessories and cosmetics.  With the earnings, she was able to continue expanding.  

She is seeking a loan to purchase the following merchandise in Managua: half a dozen pairs of pants for men, women and children; half a dozen skirts, shorts and shirts for men, women and children; sheets; curtains; sandals from girls and women.  Her dream is for her business to continue growing, to display the clothing on mannequins, and to continue supporting her children so they can have their own homes.

loans.use: purchase merchandise in Managua: half a dozen pairs of pants for men, women and children; half a dozen skirts, shorts and shirts for men, women and children; sheets; curtains; sandals from girls and women.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: Antonio tiene 29 años de edad, originario de la ciudad de Boaco. Casado y padre de un hijo. Es de oficio agricultor, se dedica al cuido de ganado y corte de semilla de zacate. Inicio este negocio hace pocos años, cortando zacates para su vaquillas, las cuales compro cuando se fue en busca de empleo en otro país. Es un hombre muy trabajador, gracias a sus esfuerzos tiene su casa. Su meta próxima es terminar de cortar las semillas de zacates y aporrearlas. Solicita el crédito para poder cancelarles a sus ayudantes que le ayudaron a cortar las semillas de zacate. Estima que el crédito le ayudara ya que podrá vender a un mejor precio el zacate para otras personas que tienen ganado. Su plan futuro es obtener un nuevo crédito para comprar ropa nueva y venderlas.
texts.en:
Antonio is 29 years old and a native of the city of Boaco. He is married and the father of a son. He works in agriculture, raising cattle and cutting grass seeds. He started this business a few years ago, cutting grass for his cows, which he bought when he went in search of employment in another country. He is a very hardworking man, and thanks to his efforts he has a house. 

His next goal is to finish cutting the grass seeds and to pound them. He is requesting a loan to be able to pay his assistants who helped him cut the grass seeds. He estimates that the loan will help him since he will be able to sell the grass at a better price for other people who have cattle. His future plan is to obtain a new loan to buy new clothes and sell them.

loans.use: to pay his assistants who helped him cut grass seeds.

loans.name: María De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
María de los Ángeles, es originaria del municipio de El Sauce, es madre de cuatro hijos, se desempeña como conserje en el hospital de la localidad desde hace más de veinte años.
A pesar de ser una labor difícil y de ganar tan poco lo hace con dedicación porque gracias a este empleo le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar y sacar adelante a sus hijos.
Es una labor difícil porque debido a la naturaleza del trabajo tiene que hacer turnos de noche para realizar la limpieza, sin embargo ha salido adelante con lo poco que gana siendo una persona de escasos recursos ha tratado de darle lo mejor que ha podido a sus hijos.
María se presentó a la oficina de Ceprodel para solicitar a los inversionistas de Kiva un crédito para pagar el título universitario de su carrera como profesional, ya que a punta de esfuerzo se preparó como Licenciada en Tecnología Médica.
Espera y confía en Dios que su crédito sea aprobado para llevar a cabo su inversión.
texts.en:
María de los Ángeles comes from the municipality of El Sauce. She is the mother of four children and has been a concierge in a local hospital for more than twenty years. Despite being a difficult job and earning a very low wage she does her job with dedication because thanks to this job it always her to bring food home daily and to get her children ahead. It’s a difficult job because due to the nature of the work she has to work night shifts to do the cleaning however, she has come out ahead with the little she earns, being a person of scarce resources she has tried to give her children the best she could.

Maria came to the Ceprodel office to request a loan from Kiva to pay for her university Degree, with effort she prepared for her Degree in Medical Technology.

She hopes and trusts in God that her loan will be approved to get her investment.

loans.use: to pay for a university Degree.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es soltera, tiene dos hijos, vive en una casa donde paga mensualmente (en alquiler)la misma se encuentra ubicada en la zona de Tahuantinsuyo de la ciudad de El Alto.
Ella estudio solo hasta el nivel secundaria; tiene su Salon de Belleza donde atiende diariamente, ofreciendo los servicios de corte, permanente y peinados. El Salón está ubicado en la misma zona  en la ciudad de El Alto.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de diferentes productos como ser tintes, spray y otros insumos que necesita para su salón. 
El sueño de Maria  es tener su salon con todas las comodidades para poder ofrecer a sus clientes   y tener mejores ingresos  mejor calidad de vida.
Es la segunda  vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Maria is single, she has two children and they live in a house which they rent. It is located in the Tahuantinsuyo area in the city of El Alto. She studied only until secondary level. She has her beauty salon where she works daily, providing haircuts, perms and hairdos. The salon is located in the same area in the city of El Alto.

The loan requested is for the purchase of different products such as hair colour, sprays and other supplies that are needed for her salon. Maria’s dream is to have her salon with all the conveniences to be able to provide to her clients and have a better income and better quality of life. It’s the second time that she is requesting a loan from IMPRO and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase hair colour, sprays and other supplies that are needed for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy banners for printing services

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Felicitas; la socia sigue dedicandose a su negocio de venta de leche de vaca,la socia vende a sus clientes que le solicitan,la socia a la vez continua dedicandose al negocio de compra y venta de productos secos como trigo,maiz entre otros,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de maiz para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Felicitas continues working in her business in the sale of milk. She sells to her customers what they request. At the same time, she continues working in the business of buying and selling dried goods like wheat, corn, among others. She wishes to be able to continue working and in this way continue supporting her family. 

She is requesting the loan to buy corn for her business. She feels thankful for the loan and is commited to making the established payments.

loans.use: to buy corn for her business.

loans.name: Faapopo

texts.en:
Faapopo is a 22 year old single woman with no children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro and bananas to earn a living. She has farmed for 3 years. Faapopo requests a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, fertilizer, chemicals, and shovels. She became a member of SPBD this year. With her profits, Faapopo hopes to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, fertilizer, chemicals, and shovels.

loans.name: Mafutaga

texts.en:
Mafutaga is 29 years old and has a partner of 3 years with 3 children. She has run a small business selling BBQ for years. 

Mafutaga requests a loan to buy mutton flaps, sausages, chicken leg quarters, soy sauce, tomato sauce and garlic onions. She joined SPBD to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Mafutaga will pay for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy mutton flaps, sausages, chicken leg quarters, soy sauce, tomato sauce and garlic onions.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en: Naomi is a 40-year-old married woman with 2 children. She runs a business to sell sugar, flour, and noodles in her community. She has 4 years of experience with this business.  Naomi requests a loan to buy snacks, soft drinks, salt, onion, flour and chicken. She plans to use her profits to help her family and her business. She has been a member of SPBD since 2013.

loans.use: to buy snacks, soft drinks, salt, onion, flour and chicken.

loans.name: La Churonita  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito La Churonita está formad por 10 mujeres quienes se dedica a varias actividades que les permiten tener su propia solvencia económica, todas se encuentran en el grupo por un mismo objetivo el cual es brindarles a sus hijos un mejor futuro. Viven en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es desde Diciembre de 1999  Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, esta bañada por 4 ríos, es la tercera ciudad de mayor importancia económicamente del país, esta ciudad es cuna de grandes poetas y atletas.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Rosa, tiene 57 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos mayores de edad, tres de ellos son casados y viven independientes, su hijo soltero está en la universidad, su esposo se dedica al negocio de bienes y raíces, la casa en la que vive es de herederos.
Doña Ros se dedica a la elaboración de artesanas desde hace 13 años, en especial se dedica a la pintar cerámica y vidrio, elabora muñecos y también hace un tiempo se dedica a dictar clases. 
El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de cerámica para pintar y continuar creciendo en este negocio. Su meta es agrandar más su negocio.
texts.en:
The credit group "La Churonita" is comprised of ten women who work in several business activities which allow them to be financially solvent. Every member joins together for the same objective: to provide their children with a better future. They live in the city of Cuenca; this city has been a World Heritage Site since its inscription in 1999. Four rivers flow through the city. It is the third most economically important city in the country. It is the cradle of great artists and athletes. 

One of the members of this group is Rosa. She is fifty-seven years old. She is married, and from this relationship, she has had four children; three of them are married and live independently. Her single child is attending college. Her husband works in real estate. The house that they live in was inherited. 

Rosa has been making artisanal crafts for thirteen years. In particular, she paints ceramics and glass, makes dolls, and also has been teaching classes for some time.

She will use the loan to buy ceramics to paint and continue growing her business. Her goal is to further grow her business.

loans.use: to buy ceramics.

loans.name: Maria Eulalia

texts.es:
María, es casada, vive con su familia compuesta por su esposo y su hijo de 6 años, ella con el fin de apoyar en los gastos familiares inicio una venta de cosméticos, sus actividades inician de 6: 00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., para ella no es una actividad difícil de realizar y no representa algún riesgo.
Invertirá el capital en la compra de labiales, esmaltes, maquillaje, rubores, entre otros productos como cremas y lociones para surtir el inventario de su negocio y tener nuevos clientes, espera mejorar sus ingresos para continuar dando su aportación a su familia y cancelar la deuda adquirida.
Aspira a tener un negocio con variedad de productos para así tener más clientes y mejorar su vida familiar.
texts.en:
Maria is married and lives with her family, her husband and 6-year-old son. With the aim of helping out with family expenses she started selling cosmetics, working from 6am to 5pm. It’s not a difficult activity for her to do and doesn’t present any risks.

She will invest the capital in the purchase of lipsticks, nail polish, make up, blush, amongst other products like creams and lotions to stock her business and to have new clients. She hopes to improve her income to continue giving support to her family and pay off her debt.

She aspires to have a business with a variety of products so that she can have more clients and improve her family life.

loans.use: to purchase lipsticks, nail polish, make up, and blush.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy eggs, chicken feed and vaccines

loans.name: Eseese

texts.en:
Eseese is 51 years old and is married with four children. She has a small garden where she grows taro, bananas and yams that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for three years. 

Eseese needs a loan to buy fertilizer, a wheel barrow, gloves, a mist blower and a bush knife. She has been a member of SBPD since 2010. Eseese will use the profits from her sales to extend her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, a wheel barrow, gloves, a mist blower and a bush knife.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar es agricultor, cada día se levanta muy temprano para poder atender su cultivo ya que su humilde trabajo como agricultor es su única fuente de ingresos para poder solventar los gastos de su hogar.

Edgar está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar fertilizantes y abono para poder mejorar su cultivo de espárragos, de esta manera poder tener un mejor cultivo y poder seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Edgar is a farmer who rises very early each day to tend to his crops. His modest work as a farmer is the only source of income to cover his household expenses.

Edgar is grateful to the Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, he can purchase fertilizers and compost to improve his asparagus crop. This way, with a better crop, he can continue working hard to make his greatest dream, that of having his own home, come true.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and compost.

loans.name: Imeleta

texts.en:
Imeleta is 43 years old and has a partner of six months with eight children. She runs a small business selling fish in her community and has been doing this for four years. 

Imeleta has requested a loan to buy fishing nets, hooks, rods, and fishing line. She joined SPBD to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Imeleta will help with her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, hooks, rods, and fishing line.

loans.name: Emeleta

texts.en:
Emeleta is a 50-year-old woman with four children. She makes and sells ice cakes in her community to earn a living. She has two years of experience with this business.

Emeleta needs a loan to buy bags of sugar, plastic bags, cordial flavors and a new freezer. She plans to use her profits to buy more ingredients to improve her business and help her family matters. Emeleta has been a member of SPBD since 2013

loans.use: to buy bags of sugar, plastic bags, cordial flavors and a new freezer.

loans.name: Yancis Carolina

texts.es:
Yancis, Para surtir sus venta comprara pesado, camarones y conchas, así tendrá más opciones de compra para sus clientes, sus ventas mejoraran   y cumplirá  con el pago de las cuotas, 
Con el préstamos anterior surtió su negocio, sus ganancias son mejores, a cancelado sus deudas, su familia vive en mejores condiciones.
texts.en: Yancis, to supply her sales, will buy fish, shrimp and oysters and thus have more buying options for her customers. Her sales will improve and she will fulfill the payment of her quotas. With the previous loan, she supplied her business [with more seafood]. Her earnings are better, she has paid off her debts, and her family lives in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy fish, shrimp and shellfish

loans.name: Safarali

texts.ru: Сафарали женатый мужчина. Ему 57 лет. Он с женой и детьми живет на районе Бохтар, там же он работает водителем такси. Сафарали в сфере услуги такси работает 4 года. Этой работе он научился от своих родственников. На сегодняшний день работа Сафарали приносит значительный доход в семейный бюджет. От своих услуг он кормит своих родных. На данный момент его машина, на которой он ездить, и зарабатывает, не пригодна для работы. Из-за того что автозапчасти стоят очень дорого Сафарали не может починить машину и он просит помочь отремонтировать свой автомобиль, чтобы вернуться к работе и продолжить зарабатывать. Он очень надеется на Вас.
texts.en: Safarali is a married man. He is 57, lives in Bohtar with his wife and children, and drives a taxi. Safarali has been a taxi driver for four years. His relatives taught him how to drive and he currently provides a significant portion of the family budget. His taxi service feeds his family. At the present moment his car that he drives for work is broken down. He can't fix it because spare auto parts are very expensive, so he is asking for a loan so he can repair the car and go back to work and earn money for his family. He is counting on your support.

loans.use: to repair his car and continue driving his taxi

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es:
La socia sigue dedicandose al negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes entre otros,la socia lleva años dedicandose a este negocio el cual le trae satisfaciones tanto economicas como personales ,la socia a la vez continua con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante  a su familia.


La socia solicita el credito para la compra de alimentos y cuyes para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The client continues making her living by raising small animals such as guinea pigs, among others. The client has been doing this work for many years and it has brought her satisfaction both economically and personally. At the same time, the client continues with her grocery store. The client is a responsible and diligent person which allows her to get her family ahead.

The client is requesting a loan to purchase food and guinea pigs for her business.

The client is grateful for the loan given and promises to pay the monthly payments.

loans.use: to purchase food and guinea pigs for her business.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORTY YUNGAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Concepcion; la socia sigue dedicandose al negocio de compra y venta de chanchos,la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicandose a este negocio el cual le trae satisfaciones tanto economicas como personales,la socia cria a sus animales para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan ,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 
 
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de alimentos y chanchos para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs the "Señor de Ccoyllorty Yungaqui" Community Bank which is located in the Anta district, Anta province, in the state of Cusco. 

Concepcion spends her time buying and selling pigs. She has a good time working in this business as it brings her both financial and personal satisfaction. She raises animals and later sells them to customers who order them from her. She hopes to continue working in this capacity to continue supporting her family. 

She is applying for a loan in order to buy feed and pigs for her business. She is grateful for the awarded loan and promises to make all of her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy feed and pigs for her business

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Doña Yolanda se encuentra muy feliz, contenta, satisfecha y agradecida con Dios por las muchas bendiciones a diariamente derrama sobre ella y su familia, trabajo y demás actividades y personas que diariamente la rodean porque gracias al financiamiento obtenido con los fondos KIVA en alianza con la cooperativa COMIXMUL pudo comprar los insumos necesarios para poder asistir sus cultivos de café. Gracias a este financiamiento ella dio asistencia y mantenimiento a 4 manzanas de tierra que ella tenía cultivadas pudiendo proteger a estos de los cambios climáticos, plagas, enfermedades asegurando sus cultivos para la próxima temporada. Gracias al primer corte de café ella logro buenas ganancias pudiendo pagar parte de su primer financiamiento para poder aplicar a las normas de COMIXMUL y re-financiar para poder nuevamente invertir en sus cultivos de café. Nuevamente ella solicita un segundo financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para poder invertir nuevamente en sus cultivos de café mediante la compra de abono, foliares, y demás productos que ayudaran a mantener sano el grano y el palo de café evitando de esta manera la contaminación y destrucción de sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Yolanda is very happy, satisfied and thankful to God for the many blessings that He provides daily to her and her family, work and other activities and people who surround them daily. Thanks to the financing obtained through Kiva funds in partnership with the COMIXMUL cooperative, she was able to buy the necessary supplies to attend to her coffee crops. Thanks to this financing, she provided support and maintenance to 4 manzanas [1 manzana is about 1.72 acres] of land that she had cultivated, protecting them from climactic changes, plagues, and diseases, ensuring her cultivations for the next season.

Thanks to the first cut of coffee, she achieved good earnings, and was able to pay back part of her first loan, and apply the rules of COMIXMUL to refinance and once again be able to invest in her coffee crops. She is requesting a second loan from the COMIXMUL cooperative to invest in her coffee crops through the purchase of manure, foliar fertilizer, and other products that will help maintain the health of the coffee beans and stalks, thereby avoiding the contamination and destruction of her crops.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for coffee cultivation

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a television.

loans.name: Vironeta

texts.en: Vironeta is 27-years-old and single with no children.  She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for two years. Vironeta has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, a frying pan, cooking oil and yeast. She joined SPBD to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Vironeta will help with her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, a frying pan, cooking oil and yeast

loans.name: Gaga

texts.en: Gaga is a 50-year-old woman who is married with four children.  She has a small tailoring business.  She has had this business for three years. Gaga needs a loan to buy needles, a sewing machine, thread and material. She will use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. Gaga joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy needles, a sewing machine, thread and material

loans.name: Pablo De Jesus

texts.es:
Pablo, solicita un nuevo que crédito le permitirá comprar camisas, pantalones, blusas, vestidos, entre otro tipo de ropa, le permitirá aprovechar la temporada de fin de año, espera obtener mejores ingresos para cumplir con los compromisos económicos.
Con la inversión anterior pudo surtir su negocio y salir adelante con su familia tiene nuevos clientes ha cancelado sus deudas, todos los miembros de su familia se encuentran saludables.
texts.en: Pablo requests a new loan that will permit him to buy shirts, pants, blouses, dresses as well as other types of clothes. This will allow him to take advantage of the end-of-year season. He hopes to earn more income so that he can meet his financial commitments. With the previous investment he was able to supply his business and to help his family get ahead. He has new customers, he has paid his debts, and all of the members of his family are healthy.

loans.use: to buy shirts, pants, blouses and dresses

loans.name: Miki

texts.en: Miki is a 34-year-old woman with five children. She makes and sells ice cakes in her community to earn a living. She has two years of experience with this business.  Miki needs a loan to buy bags of sugar, plastic bags, cordial flavoring and a cooler. She plans to use her profits to buy more ingredients to improve her business and help her family matters.  Miki has been a member of SPBD since 2013.

loans.use: to buy bags of sugar, plastic bags, cordial flavoring and a cooler.

loans.name: Fetu

texts.en: Fetu is 23 years old and single with 2 children. She has a small garden where she grows taro, bananas and yams that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 3 years. Fetu needs a loan to buy fertilizer, a wheelbarrow, shovels, gloves and a bush knife. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. Fetu will use the profits  from her sales to extend her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, a wheelbarrow, shovels. gloves and abush knife.

loans.name: Dennis

texts.en: Dennis has a farming business to support his family.  He is thankful because through his hard work, he was able to sustain his family's needs.  Despite the hardship, he still has hope to improve their living situation by requesting a loan amount of PHP 10,000. He will use this loan amount to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides to use in improving his farmland.  Hopefully, he can increase his income to save for his child's education.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides to use for his farming business

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en:
Edwin is a responsible father who commits himself in his farming business. He is 32 years old and has been operating his farmland for over six years.

He now suffers from a lack of capital, so he is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy necessities needed in farming, such as seeds, fertilizer, and pesticides. 

Edwin is hoping that, through these farm inputs, he could improve the growth of his rice crop production and lift up his family's lifestyle, someday.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and pesticides for use in farming.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new electrical system and game console.

loans.name: Melissa

texts.en:
Melissa is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Melissa is 39 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Melissa has a food vending business in the Philippines. Melissa requested a PHP 5000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like chicken, pork, chicken liver, hotdogs, etc. for her food vending business.

Melissa has been in this business for 7 years. Melissa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like chicken, pork, chicken liver, hotdogs, etc. for her food vending business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en: Violeta helps her husband working on their little farm for a living. She manages their garden of vegetable and she adds good aid her husband's income. From her farm, she was able to provide for the family and has successfully repaid her previous loan from GDMPC that she has used in farming. Recently, she borrowed a new loan to buy fertilizer in order to boost her farm. She wants to save a portion of her income as a reserve fund for her future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Henry Eduardo

texts.es: Es un hombre luchador y amable, originario de Puerto Cabezas, casado, tiene 45 años de edad y tiene 5 hijos, 4 adolescentes y una menor de edad. Desde hace aproximadamente 4 años ha vivido de manera inestable con su familia, ya que aun recuerda que cada tres meses tenía que buscar una vivienda con precio accesible a su salario para alquilarla. Sin embargo, con el sueño de tener su propia vivienda y vivir de manera segura, ha luchado por construir su casita, hace dos años compro con su aguinaldo el terreno y con el primer financiamiento otorgado por PANA PANA, le permitió compactar el suelo, y construir la estructura de madera. Actualmente solicita financiamiento para terminar de construir su vivienda de tambo y comprar 20 laminas de zinc, clavos y 464 pies tablar de madera de pino. Su sueño es contar con una vivienda que le brinde las comodidades a su familia, que sus hijos tengan sus propios cuartos, con el propósito de ir reduciendo el hacinamiento, debido a que actualmente en un solo espacio tienen la sala, cocina y cuartos, contar con fosa séptica, ya que actualmente es de letrina y cocinan con carbón en una pequeña estufa de hierro.
texts.en:
Henry Eduardo is a friendly and tenacious man and is a native of Puerto Cabezas. He is married, is 45 years old, and has 5 children - 4 teenagers and one younger child. For approximately 4 years, he has lived in instability with his family, as he is still reminded how every 3 months, he has to look for a new home to rent with an affordable price for his salary.

However, with the dream of having his own home and living securely, he has battled to build his own little house. Two years ago, he used his Christmas bonus to buy land. The first loan offered by Pana Pana enabled him to compact the floor and build the structure out of wood. At this time, he is requesting a loan in order to finish building stilts on his house and to purchase 20 sheets of corrugated metal, nails and 464 board feet of pine wood.

His dream is to have a home that offers conveniences to his family and that his children will have their own bedrooms (with the purpose of reducing overcrowding, as currently, the living room, kitchen, and bedrooms are all in one space), and to have a septic tank, since right now there is a latrine, and they cook with charcoal on a small iron stove.

loans.use: to build stilts on his house and to purchase 20 sheets of corrugated metal, nails, and 464 board feet of pine wood.

loans.name: Consuela

texts.es: Es una mujer sociable y luchadora, tiene 61 años de edad, es originaria de Puerto Cabezas casada, con dos hijos, el mayor ha culminado su carrera en Ingeniería en Informática y la menor estudia enfermería. Con el objetivo de reactivar su negocio de venta de ropa usada solicita financiamiento para comprar en Managua: 3 pacas de ropa para mujeres y hombres y venderlas a precios accesibles en las comunidades de Sandy Bay y Krukira, esto con propósito de obtener sus propios ingresos y apoyar a su familia. Hace diez años se dedicaba a vender de manera ambulante ropa usada, sin embargo, hace cinco años, syfrio un accidente de tránsito, causándole problemas neurológicos, por lo que estuvo en tratamiento en un hospital de Managua. Su sueño es seguir ayudando a su familia y a su madre que tiene 96 años de edad y se encuentra delicada de salud.
texts.en:
She is a social and hardworking woman who is 61 years old. She is from Puerto Cabezas, is married, and has two children. Her oldest child has finished studying computer engineering and the youngest is studying nursing. 

With the goal of reviving her business of selling used clothing, she requests this loan to purchase 3 packs of men's and women's clothing in Managua and sell them at affordable prices in the communities of Sandy Bay and Krukira. Her goal is to earn her own income and support her family.

Ten years ago, she began selling used clothing on foot. However, five years ago, she was in a car accident that caused neurological problems, so she had to be in a hospital in Managua for treatment.

Her dream is to continue helping her family and her mother, who is 96 years old and in poor health.

loans.use: to purchase 3 packs of men's and women's clothing in Managua and sell them at affordable prices.

loans.name: Yecenia

texts.es:
Yecenia tiene 19 años, es hija de padres separados tiene otros hermanos, pero ella es la primera en estudiar una carrera universitaria y se siente como ejemplo para ellos; su padre trabaja en el Chaco y les envía un poco de dinero mensual para pagar sus estudios.
Ella vive con su pareja y juntos tienen un pequeño local de cobros de servicios y venta-reparación de aparatos celulares que es atendido por ella misma en las mañanas, por las tardes asiste a la Facultad.
Ella pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus gastos de titulación y de esa forma poder cubrir los gastos que eso implicará.
texts.en:
Yecenia is 19 years old. Her parents are separated. She has other siblings, but she is the first one to go to college and she feels like she is an example to them. Her father works in Chaco and sends them some money each month to pay for school.

She lives with her partner and together they have a small store where people pay for utilities and where they sell and repair cell phones. She tends to the shop in the mornings and attends school in the afternoons. 

She requests this loan to invest in paying for her degree so that she will be able to pay for the costs that are associated with this.

loans.use: to pay for school expenses.

loans.name: Nimia

texts.es:
Nimia está trabajando para poder pagar sus estudios y así poder algún día hacer algo en la vida con la profesión que ha elegido, actualmente está trabajando como secretaria.
Su madre es ama de casa y su padre se dedica a la ganadería, por lo que no tienen ingresos mensuales muy elevados.
Ella está segura que por medio de su profesión podrá ayudar a su familia. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas y también para sus gastos de manutención.
texts.en:
Nimis is working to be able to pay for her education so that she will one day be able to do something in life with her chosen profession. She is currently working as a secretary. Her mother is a homemaker and her father is a rancher, so they do not have very high monthly income.

She is sure that with her job, she will be able to help her family. She requests this loan to invest in paying her bills and also for support costs.

loans.use: to pay university bills and support costs.

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.es:
Rodrigo es soltero, vive con su mama y su hermana, tiene 4 hermanos ya son independientes.
Rodrigo es una persona muy luchadora y comenta que trabajó desde los 13 años, y que hoy está estudiando la carrera de educación Física, y comenta que su sueño es ser un profesional independiente, terminar su carrera y trabajar en la profesión.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de sus estudios, y así seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Rodrigo is single. He lives with his mother and his sister. He has four other siblings who live on their own.

Rodrigo is a very hardworking person and says that since he has worked since he was 13 years old. Today, he is studying physical education and tells us that his dream is to be an independent professional, finish his education, and work in his chosen field.

He requests this loan to invest in paying his tuition bills so that he can continue studying like he has been.

loans.use: to pay school bills.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es de la ciudad de Carapeguá, es una persona que está luchando por poder salir adelante, ya que estudia y a la vez trabaja.
Dice que es muy difícil hacer ambas cosas, pero que las hace ya que es la única forma de poder ser alguien en la vida y poder crecer.
Su sueño es poder ser un profesional exitoso, que sirva, no solo a sí mismo, sino también a la sociedad. Juan pide este préstamo para utilizarlo en pagar sus clases de la universidad y también sus cuotas.
texts.en: Juan is from the city of Carapeguá and is a person who is striving to be able to move forward. He is studying and working at the same time. He says it is very difficult to do both things, but he does them because it is the only way to be able to become someone in life and to grow. His dream is to be a successful professional, who is of use not only to himself but also to society. Juan requests this loan to use to pay for his university classes and fees.

loans.use: To pay for university classes and fees.

loans.name: Vineta

texts.en:
Vineta is 52 years old and married with nine children. She runs a small canteen business in her community and has been doing this for two years. 

Vineta has requested a loan to buy bread, butter, coffee, sugar, and foam cups. She joined SPBD to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Vineta will pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy bread, butter, coffee, sugar, foam cups

loans.name: Teulagi

texts.en:
Teulagi is 18 years old and has a partner of four months with one child. She makes and sells elei printed fabrics to earn a living and has been doing this for two years. 

Teulagi has requested a loan to buy material, paint, brushes, stencils, and designs to make elei. She plans to use her profits to renew her house. She joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy material, paint, brushes, stencils, and designs

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is 32 years old and married. She has two children, one child currently in school. Merlinda works very hard to provide for them, running a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years, and she sells a variety of items, such as bread, snack foods, sugar, shampoo, detergent and soy sauce.

She has requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase more stock to sell, including bread, snack foods, sugar, shampoo, detergent, and soy sauce.

Merlinda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her store

loans.name: Mariarosa

texts.en:
Mariarosa is a 20 year old  woman with a partner of 3 years and 2 children. 

She has been earning a living from a small peanut farm.  She has been doing this for 3 years.  Mariarosa has requested a loan to buy barbed wire, fertilizer, gloves, and wheelbarrow.  

She just became a member of SPBD this year.  With her profits, Mariarosa hopes to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy barbed wire, fertilizer, gloves, and a wheelbarrow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a master's level course.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is 68 years old and married with 7 children.  She owns and operates a sewing business.  She has 2 years of experience in this line of business. 

Susana needs a loan to buy a new sewing machine, rolls of material, thread and buttons. 

She hopes to use her profits to improve her business and help her children's educations. She joined SPBD in 2013.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine, rolls of material, thread and buttons.

loans.name: Ula

texts.en:
Ula Paese is a 38-year-old, married woman. She has seven children. She has a small plantation and grows cucumbers, tomatoes, green beans and pumpkins, to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years.

Ula has requested a loan to buy a wheel barrow, weed spray, a pair of gloves, fertilizer, and chemicals. She has been a member of SPBD since 2013. With her profits, Ula hopes to improve her business. She hopes to earn more profits, to help her business and her kids' educations.

loans.use: to buy a wheel barrow and other farming tools and supplies

loans.name: Jonates

texts.en: Jonates is from the village of Paddad. She is 30 years old, married, and has three children.She has been running a sari-sari (variety) store for six years and earns approximately PHP 250 per day. Generated income from her business goes toward the daily needs of her children and basic commodities. Joantes is now requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase grocery items such as canned goods, assorted biscuits, and basic kitchen items to sell. Through this amount of loan, she will be able to develop her business and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items such as canned goods, assorted biscuits and basic kitchen items to sell

loans.name: Lara

texts.es:
La Sra. Lara tiene 36 años, vive en la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, proviene de una Familia de comerciantes, sus padres tiene un negocio en donde ella trabajaba  con sus padres en aquel entonces.
Se animo y con la ayuda de su familia se independizo hace 3  años que emprendió su propio negocio, comenta que le va muy bien en su local y que ya gano muy buena clientela.
Además aprendió muchos con sus padres de cómo llevar un negocio y por ende de cómo administrar.
Pide este préstamo para poder surtir su negocio con todo tipo de productos, como ser verduras, carme, pollo, embutidos y demás y así seguir trabajando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Lara, 36, lives in the city of Coronel Oviedo. She is from a merchant family and she used to work in her parents' business. This encouraged her, and with the help of her family, she became independent three years ago and started her own business. She says that it is going very well at her business property and that she has earned a good clientele. She also learned a lot from her parents about how to run and manage a business. 

She has applied for this loan to stock her business with all kinds of products, such as vegetables, meat, chicken, canned goods, and other items. She will continue to work as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, chicken, canned goods, and more.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is from Dinas, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She has two school-aged children. She helps her husband to operate a service-based business for earning a living for the family. She was able to repay her previous loan from GDMPC, successfully. She used her previous loan in repairing her vehicle for better service. Recently, she borrowed a new loan to buy new tires. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy new tires

loans.name: Hilarion

texts.es: El señor Hilarion vive en concubinato y tiene 2 hijos, no cuenta con muchos recursos económicos, su principal ingreso proviene de la producción de piña, pero debido a la poca extensión de su terreno su  producción agrícola es mínima, por ello solicita un crédito para la ampliación de su plantación de piña, de esta forma incrementara sus ingresos y podrá mejorar el nivel de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en: Hilarion lives with his partner and has two children. He has limited financial resources. His main income comes from his pineapple crops, but due to the small area of his land, he has low agricultural production. Therefore, he is applying for a loan to expand his pineapple crops. In this way, he will increase his income and improve his entire family's quality of life.

loans.use: to expand his pineapple crops.

loans.name: Fayzullo

texts.ru: Файзулло 63 года. Он живет с женой на районе А.Джоми. У него есть трое сыновей. Они работают и живут за приделами страны. Файзулло занимается скотоводством, но хочет параллельно заняться продажей одежды. Он считает, что еще не старый и готов начать новую деятельность. Ведь ни что не поздно начать. У Файзулло нет достаточной суммы денег, поэтому он просит кредит. Файзулло на сумму кредита приобретет первый товар. Он планирует привести одежду от рынка Корвон города Душанбе и перепродать на местном рынке. Он очень надеется, что его поддержат и его планы реализуются.
texts.en: Fayzullo is 63 and lives with his wife in the A.Jomi district. He has three sons who live and work abroad. Fayzullo raises livestock but wants to start selling clothes on the side. He doesn't think he is too old and he is ready to start a new business. After all, it is never too late to start. Fayzullo does not have enough money, though, so he is asking for a loan to buy his first merchandise. He plans to bring clothes back from the Korvon market in Dushanbe to resell at the local market. He hopes that you will support him and that he will accomplish his goal.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for resale

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan is 37 years old and married with no children.  She runs a small business selling meat buns in her community and has been doing this for 1 year. 

Joan has requested a loan to buy chicken, flour, garlic  onions, ginger, plastic bags and salt. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital. 

With her earnings Joan will help with her family's everyday needs.

loans.use: to buy chicken, flour, garlic  onions, ginger, plastic bags and salt for her meat bun business.

loans.name: Filipina

texts.en:
Filipina is 35 years old and married with no children.  She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for just a few years now. 

Filipina has requested a loan to buy sugar, flour dripping oil, yeast, eggs and baking soda. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital. 

With her earnings, Filipina will help her family's daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, oil, yeast, eggs and baking soda for her pancake business.

loans.name: Lely Del Carmen

texts.es: Lely es originaria de la ciudad de León, soltera y madre de 2 hijos. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de pulpería. Inicio el negocio hace 7 años con capital propio, y con la ayuda de su familia. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Arroz, Frijoles, Azúcar, Aceite, Gaseosas entre otros productos de consumo. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá ofertar una amplia variedad de productos a sus clientes y poder satisfacer sus demandas. Su plan futuro es ampliar el negocio y ofrecer más productos a sus clientes.
texts.en: Lely is a native of the city of León. She is single and the mother of two children. She is a retailer, and she runs her own general store. She opened her business seven years ago with her own money and the help of her family. She is applying for this loan to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, soft drinks, and related goods. She believes that this loan will be a lot of help since she will be able to offer a wide product variety and satisfy customer demand. Her future plan is to grow her business and offer more products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, soft drinks, and other products.

loans.name: Mujeres Para El Desarrollo Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres para el desarrollo está en su ciclo número 24 del programa de comité es un grupo ya antiguo, donde las integrantes se conocen bastante y están ayudándose las unas a las otras a poder crecer y mejorar sus vidas. Ellas también forman parte del programa de comité de mujeres, para poder seguir luchando por sus familias.
Una persona digna de destacar es la Sra. Gisselle quien tiene una bodega de bebidas, y también una heladería, como se ve, ella es una persona que tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por eso que se está esforzando bastante. Participa activamente de las capacitaciones y actividades del grupo.
Pide este préstamo, ya que quiere comprar un buen stock de bebidas para poder surtir su negocio, ya que se acerca el tiempo en el que mas ventas tiene y quiere poder estar bien surtida.
texts.en:
The group Mujeres Para el Desarrollo is in its 24th loan cycle of its communal bank program. It is a long-standing group where the members know each other quite well and help each other grow and improve their lives. They are also part of the communal bank of women program so that they can continue to fight for their families.

A person worth noting is Gisselle, who has a beverage store as well as an ice cream shop. As you can tell, she is a person that is very eager to succeed, which is why she works so hard. She is actively involved in the trainings and activities of the group.

She is asking for this loan because she wants to buy a good range of drinks to stock her store as the times of her highest sales are approaching; she wants to be well-stocked.

loans.use: to purchase various drinks to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa,la socia vende pantalones,blusas y casacas,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pantalones,blusas y casacas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues to work in her clothing sales business. She sells pants, blouses, and jackets. She has been in the business for several years, and she does very well. Her dream is to increase the sales of clothes. She is requesting the loan to buy pants, blouses, and jackets. 

She is happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, and jackets.

loans.name: Honoria

texts.es:
La socia Honoria se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa,la socia vende pantalones,chompas,blusas y casacas,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pantalones,casaca,blusas y chompas.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member Honoria continues working selling clothes. She sells trousers, sweaters, blouses, and jackets. She has been in the business several years and does very well. Her dream is to increase her clothing sales business. She requests the loan to buy trousers, jackets, blouses, and sweaters. The member is happy for the loan and commits herself to completing the payments.

loans.use: to buy trousers, jackets, blouses, and sweaters.

loans.name: Elybet

texts.en:
Elybet's main source of income comes from selling milkfish.  She has been in this  business for 13 years.  With this activity, she usually generates PHP 700 daily which goes toward the everyday needs of her family.  

At this moment, Elybet is in need of additional capital to sustain the growth of her fish vending business.  To make this happen, Elybet is applying for a loan of PHP 30,000.  She intends to use this money to buy milkfish ("bangus ") and other kinds of fish to sell.  

She is hoping that her loan application will be granted so she can improve her business as well as her living condition.

loans.use: to buy milkfish ("bangus ") and other kinds of fish to sell.

loans.name: Rachel

texts.en:
Rachel is 33 years old and married with three children.  With all three children currently in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Rachel runs a general store in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 15 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, soft-drinks, noodles, canned goods, cooking oil, sanitary napkins, etc. 

Rachel has requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to buy more inventory to sell in her general store.

Rachel would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more inventory to sell in her general store

loans.name: Celia

texts.en:
Celia is a hard working mother who is involved in a hog-raising business.  She aims to improve and make her hog-raising business profitable in order to sustain her family needs.  

Due to insufficient personal capital, she is asking for a loan of PHP 50,000.00 to buy hog feed and additional piglets to raise. 

Through patience and hard work, she believes that she will further improve the business and achieve her goals in the future.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and additional piglets to raise.

location.town: Brgy. Bonfal Proper, Bayombong, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Fogalele

texts.en:
Fogalele is 20 years old and married with 3 children.  

She wants to start a small business making and selling chips in her community.  To do this, she needs a loan to buy bananas, cooking oil, a large cooking pot, plastic bags, salt and a new oven.  

In the future, Fogalele hopes to extend her business.  She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy bananas, cooking oil, a large cooking pot, plastic bags, salt and a new oven.

loans.name: Orlando

texts.en:
Orlando is 50 years old and a farmer from Lallo. He has been raising corn since he has had the courage to manage farming, and that was 20 years ago. 

He patiently cultivates his farm land for the welfare of his family. Now, Orlando is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, and pesticides used in farming. 

He knows that this amount of loan will help him to keep and protect his farming business in good quality, which enables him to increase his income and improve his living condition.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, and pesticides to use in farming

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy parts and lubricant for vehicles.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
Raquel is a married woman with four children.  She is 41 years old and has two children who are still in school.  

Raquel is a very hard working entrepreneur.  She has a food vending business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 5000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like rice, noodles, vegetables, chicken, pork, etc. for her food production business.

Raquel has been in this business for 5 years.  In the future, Raquel would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like rice, noodles, vegetables, chicken, pork, etc. for her food production business.

loans.name: Las Ñustas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS ÑUSTAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Graciela ella es casada y tiene 36 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de verduras y frutas, la socia vende manzanas,naranjas,uvas,platanos y mandarinas, la socia también vende zanahorias, tomates y pepinos, la socia tiene un puesto de mercado donde vende las frutas y verduras, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las frutas y verduras. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar naranjas, plátanos, uvas, cebollas, zanahorias y pepinos.
 
 
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de carne, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank "Las Ñustas." The bank is located in the Cusco District, which is part of the Cusco Province in the Cusco Region.

Graciela is a member; she is thirty-six years old and married. She sells fruits and vegetables. She sells apples, oranges, grapes, bananas, and mandarins; she also sells carrots, tomatoes, and cucumbers. She sells her fruits and vegetables at a market stall. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. She has had this business for seven years, and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to have her own business site where she could sell fruits and vegetables. She is applying for this loan to buy oranges, bananas, grapes, onions, carrots, and cucumbers.

The other members work in animal sales, meat sales, and food sales; another member runs a grocery store.

Graciela is grateful to everyone who helps her to achieve her dream in this manner. She is committed to pay her installments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy oranges, bananas, grapes, onions, carrots, and cucumbers.

loans.name: Maugafa

texts.en: Maugafa is 36 years old and married with five children. She makes and sells samoa goods (handicrafts) to earn a living and has been doing this for many years. Maugafa requested a loan to buy pandanus leaves, materials, earrings, kava bowls, table mats and bangles for her flea market. She plans to use her profits to expand her business. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy pandanus leaves, materials, earrings, kava bowls, table mats and bangles.

loans.name: Mildred

texts.en:
Mildred is 42 years old and is married with three children.

Mildred works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy additional goods to sell in her general store.

Mildred has borrowed and paid back 6 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 8 years and also earns an income from producing handicrafts.

Mildred aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional goods to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María,  es madre de una niña de 6 años, ella es soltera, para poder solventar los gastos de su familia se dedica a vender medicina natural y química, empieza sus labores de 8:a.m. a 4:00 p.m., no posee más ingresos que los que genera con su negocio.
Utilizará el crédito para comprar reconstituyentes, vitaminas, tés, laxantes, etc., para estar preparada a las solicitudes de sus clientes, espera tener nuevos clientes, aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ganancias con las cuales cumplirá sus compromisos familiares.
Sueña con tener un negocio más fortalecido para contar con los recursos que le faciliten las mejorías en su hogar.
texts.en:
María is the mother of a 6 year old girl. She is single. In order to provide for her family’s expenses, she sells natural and conventional medicines. She works from 8:00 am until 4:00 pm. She doesn’t have income aside from what she makes through her business. 

She will use the loan to buy revitalizing tonics, vitamins, teas, laxatives, etc. so she can be prepared for requests from her customers. She hopes to have new customers, grow her sales, and increase her earnings, which she will use to take care of her family obligations.

She dreams of having a stronger business in order to have the resources that will make it possible to make improvements to her house.

loans.use: to buy revitalizing tonics, vitamins, teas, laxatives, etc.

loans.name: Lemasaniai

texts.en:
Lemasaniai is 40 years old and a single woman with three children. She runs a small business selling taro, bananas, etc. in the community and has been doing this for many years. Lemasaniai has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a shovel, spade, bush knives, wheelbarrow and backpack sprayer for her plantation business. 

She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Lemasaniai will improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a shovel, spade, bush knives, wheelbarrow and backpack sprayer.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de compra y venta de carne,la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de venta de carne.El socio solicita el credito para comprar carne.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower continues his business of buying and selling meat. He works from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm. His dream is to expand his meat-selling business He is applying for the loan to buy meat.

He is happy about the loan and promises to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy meat

loans.name: Fagasau

texts.en:
Fagasau is 75 years old and married with four children. She plans to extend a business selling tin fish, powder, flour, sugar, salt, ice cream, ice pops, chicken legs, etc. She has requested a loan to buy snacks, flour, rice, sugar, salt, soft drinks and soap. Fagasau will use her profits to help family matters and her children's education. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2008.

loans.use: to buy snacks, flour, rice, sugar, salt, soft drinks and soap.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en: Jacinta is 40 years old and is married with 4 children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for many years. Jacinta has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, yeast, eggs, frying pan, and dripping oil. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings,  Jacinta will help with her family's everyday needs.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, yeast, eggs, a frying pan and dripping oil.

loans.name: Lanuola

texts.en: Lanuola is a 56-year-old married woman with six children. She has a small plantation and grows cabbages, green onions, tomatoes, green peppers, and carrots to earn a living.
